She was also so considerate of the different dietary restrictions in our small group, making on-the-fly adjustments to the menu to suit not only the restrictions but even the food preferences. I have a severe nut allergy and I felt very safe with Sue - At each venue she reconfirmed with the wait staff that the food had been prepared to be free of any cross-contamination so I could comfortably try new things I would otherwise have been wary of.We topped the tour off with a small stroll through Barranco. This was the third time we had visited Barranco during our stay in Peru and I had thought it would be a little repetitive. Somehow however, Sue was able to show us things we hadn‚Äôt seen and teach us new things about this beautiful area. She had such a unique and interesting perspective.I will end by saying when I first saw this tour I hesitated a little at the price, but let me tell you - if you love food, drinks, learning about history and culture, and spending a wonderful evening in great company - do not hesitate, it is well worth the money, and this is the tour for you!!

title: Good times, great food!
text: Really enjoyed our tour- a smooth, professional operation. I would highly recommend to anyone new to Lima wanting to explore Barranco and Miraflores.

title: Fantastic and beyond expectations
text: Our food tour with Patricia Vasquez was nothing short of amazing. Each restaurant was unique and each menu item was a delight. We enjoyed the experience in all four restaurants that we toured and Patricia did a great job making sure all of our dietary needs were met.

title: Culinary Tour in Lima
text: We were so lucky to reserve a culinary tour with Patricia Vasquez during our trip to Peru, and it ended up being one of the highlights of our visit! Every stop offered incredible food, along with delicious cocktails and wine, and Patricia made sure all of our food preferences were taken into account.  The tour was seamless from start to finish, and we especially loved receiving the follow-up email with all the details of the restaurants and dishes we experienced.  Highly recommend!

title: Evening Gourmet Food Tour
text: Our guide Sue was excellent. The evening was fun and informative. We learned lots of history and ate authentic, yummy food. Well worth it!

title: Amazing Food Tour
text: I went on this tour on August 2025 on the first day in Lima. It was very well organized, the food was amazing and the small size of the group made the difference in the experience. Patricia was very knowledgeable about each dish and clearly excited to be with us. She was also happy to help make recommendations for the rest of my trip. I would highly recommend the tour as a starting point for the food experience in Lima.

title: Great walking tour and delicious and diverse food tasting!
text: Excellent response time from the company and Ceasar the owner arrived at the first stop of the tour to introduce himself and thank me for my business. I was the only one on the tour and Ceasar informed me that they never cancel even if there is only one person which I was very impressed with. Miguel was the tour guide. His English is excellent and he is very passionate about his city and his job. We rode the bus from Mireflores into the center of Lima and it was very fun. The stops on the tour included the local market and china town and the food was very diverse and all delicious! Miguel was such a gentleman and insisted on carrying a 40 pound box of school supplies he helped me purchase for a local community. I would highly recommend Miguel as a guide and the Travel Buddies Flavors & Tradition walking tour with Food tasting.

A fun way to enjoy some local food, drink, culture, and just get out to see Miraflores. We really enjoyed all the tastings and our time with Miguel. He was very friendly, well organized, and thoughtful. We appreciated having such a nice guide.

title: Wonderful time trying delicious food unique to Peru.
text: We had an amazing time learning about and tasting so many foods and drinks that are unique to Peru with our wonderful guide Miguel. The tour was in the centre of Lima, the old town, which is architecturally stunning. Miguel was very knowledgable about not only gastronomy but also the history of Lima; we learned so much from him and he was truly a delight. I highly recommend this tour for all the reasons noted above but also because we likely would not have eaten some of the unique and delicious food otherwise. Final comment - come hungry as you will be absolutely stuffed by the end of the tour.

title: Fabulous cultural intro to Lima!
text: I was very fortunate to be Jonathan‚Äôs guest for this four hour cultural and food sampling tour to downtown Lima. It was a fantastic experience using the Metropolitana bus system from Miraflores to downtown Lima and back. Jonathan pointed out places of interest and we journeyed to different local food eateries. It was an excellent way of trying Peruvian snacks, fruits and drink. Excellent demonstration and sampling of different Pisco drinks. Jonathan even followed up after the tour with links and pictures of things that we talked about on the tour. He molded my positive impression of Lima wishing I had more days to explore this wonderful city. Thanks for this experience!

title: Walk, talk and taste Lima with Jonathan!
text: We had a fantastic walking and tasting tour with Jonathan from Travel Buddies in Lima. Jonathan is very knowledgable about the history of Peru and took us on a great walk of Lima talking about the culture, history and stopping at various places to taste the local food. We would highly recomend this tour with Jonathan.

title: Fun food tour of Lima
text: My husband and I did this tour and it was our favorite activity we did in Lima. Our guide Johnathon was personable and knowledgeable of both Lima and the foods we tried. And there was a lot of food! It was like having a friend show us around his city. After the tour he sent us information about all the food we tried since we couldn‚Äôt remember everything. I highly recommend this tour!

title: Fantastic Tour!!!
text: The walking tour was fantastic and had a great selection of different cuisines to try. Jonathan was an incredibly knowledgeable guide. Especially his historical insights about the city of Lima. He answered all of my questions and couldn't help me enough. He even gave me multiple recommendations for other things to do and places to see in the city. Highly recommend this tour to start off your time in Lima.

title: Good tour with nice guide through Lima with great streetfood.
text: It's a very nice tour that brings you to the important tourist sites in the center district of Lima, but also tells you a lot about the local food and street food. A good tour you won't leave hungry. Our Guide Miguel was very nice and helpful, and we now have more ideas for food to try then we can eat during our stay.

title: Best Lima Tour Ever!
text: Best tour I've ever had. Our guide was amazing. Would definitely want to do it again. I learned so much and our guide really took his time and made sure we had an excellent experience.

title: A must!
text: Ximena was amazing! She was knowledgeable, passionate, and our conversations still stick with me. The food was great, but the context was invaluable. She was also really flexible and helpful with some scheduling issues we had. A huge thank you to Ximena for making our Lima visit extra special!

title: A great combo tour of things to do at night
text: Miguel was my guide and he basically served as a chaperone and facilitator to rendezvous with Aymen the Driver; I wish he would've been a little bit more proactive in telling me information about the area, I had to continuously ask him questions to get him to talk about things. That is why I am only giving it four stars. However, he was very nice and friendly.But.... Aymen was a delight, extremely knowledgeable, and had top-notch driving skills. He really understood how to make a guest feel welcome and not have any stress over the logistics of the tour with its many stops.I was leaving on a flight the next morning so I asked them if instead of three Pisco sours I could get a little food instead and they did accommodate.

title: A great way to see nightlife in Lima, conveniently and safely
text: This night tour starts as the sun goes down. Get ready for a wonderful adventure as you go downtown to try the original pisco sour where it was invented. Then enjoy a park with so many magical musical fountains it will make your head spin! The massive central fountain features a projected animated history of Peru set to inspiring music. It must be seen to be believed. Then head out to Barranco for a few more super interesting places for drinks and atmosphere. Having a private guide and driver made life so much easier and more accessible. My guide was Aymen, and he was fantastic. He explained a lot about the history of the drinks, the various districts of Lima, the fountains, and more. He went above and beyond to make sure I had an excellent time, making this one of the most enjoyable parts of my wonderful trip to Peru.

title: Highly recommend
text: Wonderful tour. Thank you Rudi for an excellent, friendly and informative tour. The food was all amazing and so interesting to hear about local history and culture. Highly recommended!

title: Great variety of Peruvian food
text: Great variety of stops and good, spaced well with walking time and sitting to eat. Guide was very knowledgeable and nice

title: Great food, great stroll
text: We did this tour on our first full day in Lima and it was such a lovely introduction to Peru. The tour included coffee, chicharrones, a variety of fruits, ceviche, a chilcano cocktail, and churros. All of the food was great and the walk was really lovely as well. We also visited a small market where we bought the fruit. Definitely recommend this tour as a quick and easy way to get introduced to some Peruvian foods and get in a great walk around some beautiful parts of Miraflores.

title: Amazing food (and history) tour
text: My tour with Alina was amazing. She's very friendly and thoughtful. She showed us the great spots to enjoy in Miraflores, Peruvian history and cuisine. Gracias!

title: The Conde's in Peru
text: We had a tremendous experience. Our guide was fantastic and very knowledgeable, and the food was absolutely incredible. Don't pass this tour up.

title: Wonderful introduction to Per√∫.
text: Jonathon was an outstanding guide. He passionately shared his knowledge of the unique flavours of Per√∫, while weaving in historical and cultural notes. The food we tasted was wonderful and the venues terrific.

title: Great value for the money
text: Ruddy was an awesome tour guide. No one else signed up so it was just the two of us. I learned so much about the food culture of Lima. The coffee, churro, pork sandwich, rice pudding, fish ceviche, and pisco sour were all great. The tour of the fruit market was interesting too. None of the locations were crowded, so I never felt rushed. It was very relaxing.

title: Well worth your time
text: Jair was excellent. We were going to do a tour of Lima later so I waned to do some thing different. The food tour of Miraflores was a great choice. Good food and drink and very educational.

title: A fruit tasting walk around.
text: Very nice, the first restaurant got our order mixed up but they corrected it. Our guide was good. His history was very clear.

title: Good mix of food
text: Very informative with interesting mix of food from savoury to sweet including lots of different types of fruit. Good to try the local cuisine.

title: Incredible journey
text: All very beautiful. Family trip without disturbances. The landscapes are amazing, all the guides that accompanied us were wonderful. Good hotels and great food.

title: Fabulous day of Sea, Desert and Flight.
text: It was an amazing experience, Aymen and Jair were my private guides, they were all day watching me, super punctual with all the activities and willing to always answer all my questions, they gave me very important recommendations to make my day go fabulous! 100% recommended if you have little time in Lima and want to do all the same day including the Nazca Line.

title: Ballestas Islands, Nazca Lines and Huacachina Oasis
text: Excellent attention, unparalleled walk, super well attended, wonderful guides and slopes of everything at all times

title: Incredible experience
text: What an incredible day we had exploring the beautiful region of Paracas with Jonathan as our private guide! From start to finish, Jonathan provided us with an amazing and authentic experience.Jonathan picked us up bright and early at 3am, and immediately made us feel welcome and comfortable in his vehicle. Throughout the day, his driving was excellent - he navigated the roads safely and efficiently, allowing us to sit back and take in the stunning desert landscapes.Our first stop was the Paracas National Reserve, where we took a boat out to the Ballestas Islands. Jonathan pointed out the diverse array of endangered marine life, including sea lions, Humboldt penguins, and dozens of species of seabirds. His knowledge of the local flora and fauna was incredibly impressive.After the boat tour, Jonathan drove us to some amazing viewpoints where we could see the famous Nazca lines etched into the desert floor. It was a breathtaking sight, and Jonathan provided great context and history about this archaeological wonder.For lunch, Jonathan took us to a wonderful local restaurant that served up authentic Peruvian cuisine and pisco sours. The food was delicious, and Jonathan made sure we tried all the regional specialties.Throughout the day, Jonathan was an absolute delight to be around. He was friendly, engaging, and clearly passionate about sharing the beauty of his country with visitors. He went above and beyond to ensure we had an unforgettable experience.We can't recommend Jonathan highly enough as a private guide in Peru. His expertise, hospitality, and genuine care for his guests made our day trip an absolute joy from start to finish. We're so grateful we had the chance to explore this stunning region with him.

title: Great tour agency and reliable guide
text: Went for a one-day tour to Ballestas, Nazca Lines Overflight & Huacachina Oasis. Our guide, Aymen, took a great care of everything. He is so knowledgeable and will patiently explain every question you asked. I personally love how he shared his story with Peru and how he felt while living in Lima.Travel Buddies Peru and Aymen still host some other tours like one-day Lima tour or other customized tour. And this experience is so great that if I would visit Peru again, I would still want to register their tour and cooperate with them!

review: Overall, we were very pleased with this tour! It is a long day but flies by and covers some major sites in the area. We booked through the companies website and they were great at communication with us regarding pickup time and questions we had. We came prepared and packed snacks and water for day. We stopped at a connivence store about an hour into the drive for a bathroom break and snacks. The cafe was not open but we bought some premade sandwiches. Nothing fancy but lots of selection. We then did our boat tour and our guide, Sergio, got us to the front of the line with little waiting time. We then continued our trip to Huacachina, where our guide told us interesting facts and lore of the area and took us for a walk around the oasis. We had the option to eat a quick lunch but decided to spend our time exploring instead and ate the snacks we brought. We did the sand boarding and dune buggy ride, which was my personal highlight! Then we ended the day with the Nazca line flight. We had a bit of a wait at the airport but that had nothing to do with the tour. The wait was definitely worth it. I was worried about gettting sick as I dislike flying to start with and have a minor fear of heights. I took some gravol beforehand and grabbed some lemon candies at the front desk and was fine the whole flight. This tour is definitely worth the money as you get a small car to take you around which is by far quicker than bus transportation. You also get to leave your bag in the car so you don‚Äôt need to worry about carrying around sunscreen, snacks, water, etc. you also have someone who speaks the language and is aggressive enough to get you to the front of the lines which is great! Lastly, we always were brought to clean bathrooms at tour group offices rather than having to use the public bathrooms at the places we stopped. I highly recommend this tour!

title: Excellent and reliable agency to get to know Peru
text: I want to comment on my review from previous months to Lima and the surrounding area with the Travel Buddies agency and it was magnificent, we took a tour to the Ballestas Islands, we flew over the Nazca lines and the Huacachina oasis in an incredible way since I did not think I would be able to see from high in the plane the world famous and enigmatic Nazca lines, in the same way we were in the historic ballestas islands getting to know Paracas and it was magnificent and to finish that magical adventure I visited the oasis of Huacachina and I was more than fascinated since the tubular ride It is truly incredible to see the dunes of the desert at full speed. The next day they gave me a gastronomic bicycle tour of the city and it was very fun with the guide and delicious food.The agency is very serious and with excellent service from the punctuality for the hotel pick-up to the cleanliness of their transfer vehicles and the staff who are very attentive and accommodating at all times, I highly recommend them.

title: Exciting Day out with so much to see
text: Picked up on time (5.30am) at hotel by guide Sergio and driver Martin. Both excellent. Flying over the Nazca Lines was a big tick off my bucket list and I loved this experience. Small plane and 4/10 passengers were either sick or queasy and not enjoying = I loved it. Everyone has a window seat and the plane banks at 45degree left and right so you all get a clear view.Ballestas lake = again a great experience. Speed boat ride (24 passengers) - with a cover so you are not in blazing sun. Taken to various features - geological and archeological and then to colonies of sea lions. Only saw a couple of penguins, but a lot of other sea life. Water so clear. Tour buddies had made sure I was on a boat with an English speaking guide so I missed nothing.Huacachina Oasis - beautiful, but more commercialised and busy than I expected - and I went on a week day in ‚Äòlow season‚Äô. Lots of activities like paddle boating, sand buggy drive etc if you wanted to indulge.Although I was doing this on my own (62) it would be great for families with teenagers who like a bit of a thrill. it‚Äôs a Long day out though. 3 1/2 hours to first destination, short trips between lake, airport and oasis, but then 4 hours back (and I didn‚Äôt do dune buggies). Extremely comfortable car - Big SUV. Lots of breaks to grab snacks, restrooms etc. Sergio kept me entertained with information about the local culture, history, Music and even ghost stories. They ensured my safety and enjoyment all through the day and gave me tips for other trips (winery) but I am flying back to UK today.

title: Travel Buddies was a great tour company for our travel to Peru
text: Pablo from Travel Buddies helped us craft an amazing private tour for our family of 5 to Peru. We had Ruddy as our great guide to take us through Lima to Huacachina, Ballestas Islands, and the incredible Nazca Lines. We then had a wonderful tour guide, Lenin from Cusco who ably guided us to Rainbow Mountain, dealing very professionally with one of our party who suffered from altitude sickness. The following days we travelled with Lenin to Chinchero, Ollantaytambo and the magnificent Machu Picchu. We highly recommend the professional and wonderful Travel Buddies tour company. Thank you!

title: Book this tour
text: Highly recommend. Stress free day site seeing. Only word of caution is that the flight over the nazca lines is not for those with a weak stomach. Ruddy was our guide, he didn‚Äôt an excellent job. Proficient English. Just book it, won‚Äôt regret it.

title: An unparalleled experience!
text: Wonderful tour: Unforgettable ballestas, Huacachina - beautiful and buggy oasis with plenty of adrenaline, and don't miss to slip through the dunes, on the delicious sandboard. Finally, Vineyard - after the heat of the desert, the freshness of lunch under the trees and the tasting of the various types of Pisco. Passeio Maravilhoso!!!

title: Great, personal tour!
text: The Driver (Martin) and tour guide (Jonathan) were amazing and took care of us the whole trip. Jonathan Had very good knowledge about everything we wanted to know about. As this was a personal tour we could even plan individual stops like watching the sunset at the beach... This was no issue at all.Everything was perfect and we couldnt have asked for more. Absolutly recommended.

title: Highly recommended
text: Spectacular tour. Miguel and Mart√≠n very good hosts and guides. Absolute comfort in times, the private vehicle

title: Great day tour!
text: The trip was amazing!  Our guide Jonathan was friendly, informative and just perfect!  I highly recommend him and our driver Martin they made the trip memorable!  Jonathan‚Äôs explanation about everything on our trip was just what we were looking for.

title: They saved my tour
text: C√©sar, who answers your messages, behaved like an Angel with us, very diligent, they are attentive to all the requirements, he even helped me by accommodating a problem in my review. They will not leave you stranded with your plans, the package that includes meals is perfect, you will be in very good company!

title: Absolutely Incredible! Best Tour I've ever been on!!!!
text: My son and I went on a private tour with Ayman from Lima to Huacachina Balestras Islands and the Reserve -- and then dropped us off that night downtown Lima to catch the magic color water fountains. They customized it slightly to skip the winery as we weren't interested. From the moment they picked us up from our hotel, I was given a masters level class in Peru. (they asked if I wanted it.. or wanted to sleep!) The entire day I learned abut the people, the culture, the geography, food, politics, etc. I asked questions, they asked questions. By the end of the trip I wanted to invite them to my home in the US -- it was that type of rapport and friendship that resulted from the entire day. The icing on the cake was when we arrived at the Oasis, and after having lunch together we were to ride the sand buggies. It is an insane climb up the dunes to get to the cars, and I knew I couldn't make it as I have mobility issues. But Ayman talked with the company and had the car come much closer so I wouldn't have to miss the opportunity. It was one of the happies experience in my life to be able to do excursion, be out on the dunes, and have someone advocate for me. When I go back to Peru -- I'm already planning another trip, travel buddies will by the agency that I choose without question.

title: Amazing mix of adventure and relaxation, highly recommend!
text: We had such an amazing time on this tour! It is the perfect mix of adventure and relaxation, starting off taking a boat ride to see the wildlife on the Ballestas Islands, then going to the Huacachina Oasis for dune bugging and sand boarding, and finally going to the pisco winery for some amazing food and fantastic drinks! Aymen, our guide, went above and beyond to make our experience special, including giving the best food/drink recommendations and stopping so we could see wild flamingos during our drive! He was so knowledgeable and taught us a lot about life in Peru during our drive, which only added to the experience. Highly recommend booking this tour!

title: Super recommended!
text: We went with Aymen and Sergio and the experience was spectacular! They are the best, very friendly, they explained everything to me from the moment I left and we had a great time. Thank you so much!!

title: Perfect and fun
text: Rudi and the driver ( sorry I forgot his name) were so friendly,  knowledgeable,  and provided a very safe environment for me to have an amazing day. They immediately put me at ease.  What an amazing adventure.  Thank you so very muchRobert

title: Excellent tour!
text: We had an excellent tour experience with our guide Rudy and driver Rodolfo. We learned a lot about Per√∫‚Äôs culture and history. The ride went smooth; Rodolfo is a careful driver. Rudy made sure we were attended speedily in the Ballestas Islands‚Äô tour were we boarded a motorboat with other tourists, and was there waiting for us when we returned. The boat trip was superb- got to see many different birds and sea lions. The buggy ride in Huacachina  was a lot of fun; safe riding. Lunch went well with typical food at a nearby restaurant. Wine & pizco tasting was interesting. Overall, it was a very enjoyable experience.

title: Unbelievable team with very friendly and professional teachers
text: I rented surf boards during 5 months and I can say that the Pukana team is the best team you can find in Lima. Friendly, honest, helpful, useful. Always with the smile, it is impossible not to have a good moment with them. Many friend of mine took classes there and they improved quite quickly thanks to the good advices of the teachers.Also went to several surf trips at a few hours from Lima and was really well-organised.Big thanks especially to Javier and Lorenzo, los jefes de la playa !!

title: Top notch experience
text: Such a great experience. Called up for hire of a board and wetsuit and was greeted with big smiles and loads of Stoke.I didn‚Äôt require a lesson so just hired a wetsuit and board. There was a good selection of boards and Javier and the guys were quick to invite me for a session elsewhere. We drive to a spot down the road with pumping waves and good vibes in the water.I had some quality surf shots taken that will definitely be going in the collection.Many thanks Javier and crew, I felt like one of your surfing buddy‚Äôs and not a customer.I highly recommend paying these guys a visit. 10/10

title: Amazing experience for surfers of ALL skill levels
text: Amazing experience with Javier! They took us to a very I crowded break that was perfect for our skill levels and had the right surfboard for all levels. Afterwards, they took us to the best chicken restaurant I have ever been to. They are all very nice and great surfers.

title: Professionals
text: These folks have surfing in their hearts and want to share their passion for the sport. Every time I have friends coming to Lima, I take them here. The staff is very professional, and you will fall in love with surfing and the Peruvian ocean after surfing with them. Gracias Pukana ü§ôüèæ

title: Experienced surfer enjoying Peruvian surf with familia.
text: After spending 5 days touring Cusco through Machu Picchu, we made our way back to Lima to spend the rest of our vacation.  And of the activities we enjoyed while in Peru was surfing.  Being an experienced surfer from Hawaii, I was looking for a rental operation that would rent decent fiberglass performance surfboards and not the typical heavy/slow rental boards.  Based on earlier reviews, I emailed Pukana Surf who promptly replied and readily accommodated my request for performance surfboards with one of Peru's top surfboard brands - Klimax.  When I arrived, I was greeted by Javier who was looking out for my arrival since there are other competing rental outfits along the same shoreline.  They have the most professional looking tent and large cargo truck as so they are in my opinion most legitimate.  More so after renting the boards and asking them to give surf lessons to my Peruvian relatives.  I would have taught them the same way back in Hawaii.  There seem to be standard association rental rates that they had to abide by since the other tents had the same rate poster.  Still very reasonable.  And the quality and extras make Pukana the best deal.  Getting to Playa Makaja can be a bit challenging however.  Without knowing better, a 20 minute taxi ride from Montericco costed 50 soles.  Should have been more like 20 soles.  Pukana offers pickups and so it might be an better option if you have time to coordinate it.  Aloha!

title: Exceptional!
text: Our experience with Lima Discover was simply exceptional. The city tour we did with the guide Ishmael and the driver Luis exceeded all our expectations. Ishmael accompanied us with admirable delicacy and professionalism, sharing rich and detailed information about Lima‚Äôs history and culture, always with a smile and willing to answer all our questions. Luis, for his part, drove with total safety and kindness, making us feel comfortable at all times. Thanks to both of us, we not only got to know the city, but also had a warm, enriching and memorable experience.

title: Excellent tour from the airport through the city of Lima.
text: Exceptional! Punctual, good service. All very well structured. Recommended 100%.  The tour started at the scheduled time from the international airport. The recommendation for lunch was very good! Thanks for everything.

title: UN DIEZ!!!
text: I am from Argentina, we were 5 pairs of friends. Everything we coordinate by WhatsApp with Andres! Excellent from day one, we made the transfer to the airport to the hotel and vice versa, we went to callao, we toured historic Lima. We had a flight cancellation and adapted to our new schedule. The guide, drivers, transfer units and Andres are excellent!!

title: Joyful Argentines ‚ù§Ô∏è
text: They are amazing!! They are very friendly and attentive. Thank you for your commitment.Aguante Suardi -Argentina and Lima-PeruThey came looking for us and from there our adventure began... There are no words to describe so much culture and the value people place on it.

title: Horrible service
text: Terrible experience. I booked a tour two weeks in advance and received confirmation. However, when I arrived at the airport, no one was there to pick me up. I called and spoke to someone who told me they were having issues and couldn‚Äôt pick me up. No one contacted me beforehand to inform me of any changes, which left me stranded and without time to make other arrangements. Completely unprofessional. I would never do business with them again.

title: Highly recommend! Picked us up at our airport hotel and returned us there also
text: Our city tour of Lima from the airport was an amazing experience! Ismael our tour guide for the day and Leandro our driver were fantastic! They were both full of interesting facts and were a pleasure to spend the day with

title: Great experience
text: We had a fantastic experience! Ismael was our tour guide. His English was really good, he knew a lot about the city and he is very friendly! We had Chavier as a driver and he was awesome as well.  Lima Discovery team was very fast answering messages and professional. Thank tou for the fantastic experience and continue with the good work! I highly recommend their services!

title: See Lima!
text: This is a really good tour. Tour leader/driver was very nice and professional. In tour guide was knowledge and full of interesting facts about Lima. Tour leaves right from airport.

title: Regular experience.
text: We couldn't do the whole tour, because of traffic delays and that day there was a national football team game. We started by the coast, when we got to the historic center it was very congested. We should have done it the other way around.It didn't include the catacombs either.

title: Great overview of Lima
text: I had a long layover in Lima between flights and this was the perfect way to spend 6+ hours experiencing some of what Lima has to offer.  I was met at the airport just outside the exit doors and escorted to the vehicle which was rather new and comfortable.  My guide spoke excellent English and shared many interesting and relevant facts about the history of Lima.  There was a driver who always had the car waiting for us.  We visited the main city squares, wandered through the streets to see some daily life, I was given a tour of the Franciscan church and the catacombs (creepy and may not be for everyone, but very interesting,) and we then headed down to Miraflores for a view of the shore and a different aspect of the city.  I invited my guide to join my for a delicious ceviche lunch at a restaurant that he recommended and we had a chance to discuss Peruvian life and culture.  Overall, it was a terrific opportunity to see the city, have a great meal, learn from a local (isn't that why we travel anyway?) and pass some of the time before being returned to the airport for my onward flight.  The only downside is that traffic in Lima is unbearable, but the driver was skillful and did his best to make his way while keeping us on schedule.  I would highly recommend this family owned company and their day tour.

title: Such an awesome & unique experience!!
text: Absolutely amazing experience!! The off roading was thrilling and the sand skiing was so unique & sooo fun!!The guides were so kind & spoke English well! They gave us water & snacks & transported us directly from our hotel.Will definitely book again next time I‚Äôm in Lima :)

title: Great experience
text: Aldo, our guide/instructor, and Carlos, our driver, were very friendly and knowledgable! We were experienced snow skiiers and boarders, but were humbled by the experience on sand. Very challenging and fun! I would definitely reccommend this to folks who are looking for a unique recreational activity in the Lima area.

title: Fun and adventure with a great local guide
text: The guide and driver were awesome. So much fun. Our first time sand skiing and Carlos and Ronaldo made it exciting and special. Two true locals with an extra cute little dog. If your are seeking fun and adventure these is the guide to book with.

title: New fun experience
text: We were both skiiers and and a boarder, and had a great time in the sand. The guide did a great job describing similarities and differences to the snow, and the driver did a great job driving the dunes.

title: Absolute recommendation
text: What a great afternoon! The course was really fun and I was really surprised how easy it was to prepare such delicious things. I don't think I've ever cooked food so nicely, I was really proud. Because a lot was prepared for us, we had time to prepare four things. The instructors were really cool and told us a lot of interesting things about the dishes and the ingredients. Also, the location is super nice. If I am back in Peru, I would definitely come back and join one of the other menus that are available to choose from.

title: You can‚Äôt go higher than Skykitchen!
text: A fantastic cooking class-We prepared Pisco Sour and dishes that we then liked even more than those of various local restaurants tried in the previous days.The lesson takes place in a modern kitchen, nice, and everything ready to cook and tidied up immediately with discretion- )A really fun and interesting evening, we learned much more than 4 classic Peruvian dishes!I recommend it for groups of friends/colleagues (like us) or even families. If I return to Lima I would do another even more complete, including shopping at the market and use of local fruit:)A big thank you to our hosts/masters!We will not forget your Skykitchen!

title: Awesome cooking experience
text: Had an amazing cooking experience at SkyKitchen. Great friendly environment with so much great food. Highly recommend!

title: One of the highlights of our visit to Lima.
text: We were visiting family in Lima, last week. My hubby and I were looking for something fun to do on our own. I found Sky Kitchen on TripAdvisor and booked it. It turned out to be one of the highlights of our trip! Yurac and Maritza (sp?) were great. We had so much fun learning about the history of Peru and their cuisine. We also liked that the class size was small so it was more personable. This class would be good for couples or families with older children. The food was so delicious! I hope that I can recreate the meals, we made, when I try to make them at home!

title: A must for foodies.
text: A very nice and educational experience.  Lots of explanations about products and useful tips & tricks. We foodies have learned a lot from it and are even more motivated to make the tasty dishes from Peruvian cuisine at home. And of course the pisco sour. Make sure to bring at least a bottle of Pisco when you fly home! Because we had already made a market tour during a previous stay in Lima, we did not do that this year. For a complete picture of Peruvian cuisine, such a tour is also highly recommended. We have experienced the flexibility and conviviality as very enjoyable. Thank you!

title: Fabulous afternoon in a beautiful setting
text: This is a wonderful activity as a solo traveler to meet a variety of people visiting Lima. The recipes are wonderful and the techniques were very helpful. I‚Äôve returned to the US and have enjoyed using what I learned to cook for friends.

title: Wonderful cooking class in Lima
text: My 12-year old son and I enjoyed this wonderful cooking experience in Lima on Dec 31. I had some Peruvian cuisine experience, but I learned so much about the ingredients and techniques that make it so unique. The kitchen and dining area offer an amazing view of the whole city and everything was really well organized for us to have the best time, enjoy the food we cooked and ask questions to our chef, Yurac. He was very patient and incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. I highly recommend this fun cooking and dining activity during your stay in Lima.

title: Must-see experience!
text: Yurac, Christian and Maritza allowed me and my son to live an unforgettable experience. Seeing the step by step of the incredible dishes of Peruvian cuisine, was a real pleasure. And let alone that we then enjoyed what was produced! The atmosphere is warm, relaxed and friendly. It is an experience that I will not fail to recommend.

title: If you enjoy cooking or eating, do this
text: This is a very fun and interesting class. Whether you're a novice or experienced in the kitchen, you will learn some things. You get the recipes and can try them at home. Just try to eat all you make. It will be a challenge.  Highly recommend.

title: How a Peru holiday should begin
text: Had a superb introduction to Peruvian cuisine with Christian. In excellent German and English we received a lot of tips and a comprehensive insight into the extraordinary cuisine of the country. After the preparation of the pisco sour followed Causa, Ceviche, Lumo saltado and Picarones. I can't imagine a better start to a Peru holiday.A very special thank you also for sending all recipes in German.

title: Terrible
text: They were late and marnated me on the parking for 20 min. It was terribly cold and i asked to let me know when driver arrive, while ill be waiting in terminal. Thaey were saying multiple times hes coming, almist there etc, but i have to go back to terminal every tome.Finally i found driver but he didnt let me in, so i have to go back to tetminal again.Just pay extra 5 usd and take uber, dont waste your time.

title: Not reliable!
text: DO NOT USE! they are unreliable. The posting offers various pick up times. We selected 10:20am on a Saturday June 21. They messaged back saying they‚Äôd pick us up on June 26th at 11:20am because they don't do pick ups at 10:20am on a Saturday. Once we got them to acknowledge they had the wrong date, we said we‚Äôd go with 11:20am pickup. My gut told me to walk away but I didn‚Äôt. üòù When we arrived in Lima we went to the designated pick up location at 11:05 and waited until 11:40 but they never showed up. Now they‚Äôre trying to say they were there. There was no purple van with a llama on it anywhere. Don‚Äôt waste your time and frustration on this transport go with a more reliable driver.

title: Great shuttle service
text: On time, cheap and still fairly efficient. Great way to get a sneak peek at the city since there are some other drop offs to do. Can‚Äôt beat the price.

title: Easy and reliable
text: Although we were a little hesitant, reviews of the other travelers convinced us to give this company a try. Do not regret it! They were easy to converse with pre-departure, arrived as scheduled, and dropped us off at the door of our hotel in Mira Flores. Would not hesitate to use them again.

title: Badly organised, disrespectful company
text: Very, very poor and risky service (only just managed to not miss my flight but at high expense).The van never arrived for pickup from the hotel even after having confirmed the location twice via Whatsup days in advance.Operators also having a disrespectful attitude following this serious issue.Also refused refund.A very stressful experience, would not recommend this company under any circumstance.

title: A cheaper shuttle than the bus from the airport, it will drop you off wherever you want to go.
text: They leave regularly in the morning, so if you book in advance, you don't have to pay, and they take you wherever you want to go in Miraflores. There is a little less security around the airport, so you can take this shuttle directly to Miraflores, which is safe, without leaving the airport grounds. Parking lots 1 and 2 behind the Costa Del Sol hotel stop in between. It's a shuttle, so you can be a few minutes late, but there's only one way in and out of the airport, so you know when you're coming in. The purple body won't be missed, so you don't have to stop in the parking lot to wait a little.

title: Seamless experience
text: I took Quickllama from Miraflores to the Airport. Booking the ticket online was easy but I think you can also just show up and pay. Seamless experience.

title: Trust the llama ü¶ô
text: Extremely professional and very polite. If you want safe transportation,this is the company for you. Amazing job! Door to door service and the price is unbeatable.trust this company ü¶ô

title: Not great.
text: It was somewhat disappointing. We had to stand outside at night, after a long trip, for an hour. If we had used Uber or a taxi, we wouldn't have had to wait.

title: Lousy service; irresponsible.     No help from Trip Advisor
text: Terrible, terrible service.  Never arrived.  We searched all over. They agreed driver had trouble. Had to pay double to get to our hotel after hour wait.   Now, they insist we pay for service never provided. Horrible to deal with. Avoid. Allen Hench Charlottesville, VA

title: Excellent visit
text: Laura was an excellent Guide. We visited the center of Lima and the Larco museum in a quiet and pleasant way. I missed having some free time at one of the places we visited.

title: City Tour Lima, Larco Museum and Casa Aliaga
text: The tour has been very complete, we loved the visit to the Larco Museum and Aliaga house that we know is exclusive to Lima Tours. But the best thing was our Rosa Guide, a very charming and knowledgeable person who shared generously with us.

title: Worth it
text: Interesting tour to take advantage of the free time in Lima.The most interesting thing was the Larco museum, where there is the history of Peru in fantastic historical pieces.

title: It's worth it
text: A very informative activity with prepared guides, patients with a good attitude. Definitely recommended.

title: First time
text: Nice city. The excursion to the very beautiful water fountain, as well as the excursion to the center of Lima. Good restaurants.

title: Excellent visit.
text: The visit was very good with contact with the local culture and the relevant explanations in each place. Highly recommended.

title: Historic center - Lima
text: Beautiful architecture and guides with good knowledge of the information on the sites. Improve the time of the Tour, the end was very rushed

title: Too Rushed!
text: The tour was very rushed. The guide did not care if the visitors are able to keep pace or not. Not enough time to look around, especially at the Larco Museum.

title: Brief visit to Lima
text: Very nice excursion for the little time I had available! Good explanations that allowed me to learn more about this beautiful country

title: Good city centre trip
text: Great tour of the centre of Lima. The buildings were impressive and the main square was very interesting. Cathedral was beautiful inside. Our guide was excellent. Larco museum was unusual to say the least. Good half day trip

title: It was a great night. We had lots of fun together. Realy enjoyed all the fountains and water features. I would recommend for
text: It was very nice. I liked the history, the fountains and all the colors. There was 13 fountains the children were having a great time.

title: Highly recommend this tour!
text: Our guide did a great job of touring the fountains before the show. He found a great place right in the middle to watch the show on a crowded Friday night. The cultural buffet was not available, so we were taken to Cafe Tambo instead. The cafe was excellent and had a good selection on the preset menu. The guide was very knowledgeable and the driver was excellent navigating through Lima traffic. I would highly recommend this tour!

title: Spectacular!
text: The fountains show was really magical, the bus comfortable, guide&driver friendly, dance show and horse show spectacular!

title: Fabulous fountains and water show and fun folkloric show.
text: I very much enjoyed the show and was pleasantly surprised to see the Paso horses. The guide, Vienna was excellent. I was only person on the tour and it was not cancelled for lack of interest. Thank you. The fountains and water show was really great.it was also really nice to have transportation provided.

title: Fun adventure
text: Picked up from hotel and driven to magic water circuit fountains and light show.  Fun group of 9 and our guide was wonderful.  Beautiful fountains great show with lights and music then on to a buffet dinner and folklore show.  Good food great show.  Delivered back to hotel safe and sound.

title: Beautiful Fountains with an incredible dinner
text: Being able to visit the Magic water circuit to watch the unforgettable magic water show is a must when visiting Lima. The dinner and show provided after the show was filled with delicious Peruvian cuisine and a wonderful dance to watch. The only aspect of this experience I think could have been improved was that I would have liked to spend more time at the Magic Water circuit. It should be noted though that this was not because of the tour guides themselves. Unfortunately, some of the other participants were late causing us to leave later than planned, thus shortening our available time at the magic water circuit. That being said, if you have timely traveling partners, it may provide that extra time that I wish we would have had.

title: Excellent guide, good filling midday tour.
text: Our guide Alondra was very well informed, friendly and great company. She guided us through an excellent tour of local delicacies, coffee and chocolate and finally ice cream. We turned up hungry and probably won‚Äôt need to eat for a week. Good value and a fun way to spend 3-4 hours.

title: It's a must-do!
text: We took this tour with Alondra today - it was amazing!  We got to try a variety of foods unique to Peru and she had stories to share about all of them.  Alondra had tons of info about the city and history of Peru (not just Lima, but all over).We highly recommend taking this tour!!Thank you, Alondra!

title: Knowledgeful and very friendly guide!
text: Diana was very knowledgeable and guided us quietly through both gastronomic and cultural pearls of Barranco. The various dishes were varied and tailored at lunchtime. Great diversity in both food and drink. Very nice way to explore Barranco.

title: Points
text: Friendly Delicious Interesting Amazing Recommend Landing It is an enriching experience on the gastronomic route. The guide dominates the subject.

title: very good
text: The experience has been very good and the guide super expert clarifying the doubts we had. It is recommended to go without eating much before the tour because they have a lot of variety of food. I really liked the surprise dish.

title: Perfect way to experience Lima!
text: This was a great opportunity to experience Lima‚Äôs history and culture through its food!Alondra was a wealth of knowledge and a pleasure to spend the afternoon with! We will definite recommend this tour to visiting friends!

title: Great!
text: Diana was an amazing guide and we had the best time! The food was great and we also had good explanations for everything on our walk.

title: Friendly and relaxed food experience
text: We thoroughly enjoyed this tour. Diana was a friendly and knowledgeable guide, and the food and drink was great. Highly recommended.

title: Great guide and delicious food
text: Wonderful guide and great food in Barranco. Alondra was very knowledgeable and personable. We had a great time with the group and learned a great deal about the Peruvian culture.

title: Delicious food and a charming guide.
text: We had a great time today on the food tour with Diana. Everything was delicious and the tour was well done. We had a wonderful time.

title: Colorful!
text: Magical fountains - just a  15-20mins car drive from Miraflores area. It is a great place to spend an evening with your family and friends. The fountain circuit is awesome and very colorful in the evenings. It was packed when we visited the park(expected I guess on the weekend before Christmas). Allow couple hours to do the circuit and do not forget to walk through the fountain arch. The park does multimedia shows very hour. They charge a small entrance fee. Food and drinks are available inside the park. You can buy your tickets at the park entrance and there is no online booking necessary.

title: Nice show
text: Large spaces to walk, eat, have fun and rest; all the water fountains are a spectacle in themselves‚Ä¶Very good panorama

title: Unique experience
text: The fountains, music, and lights were enjoyable to see. The colors were vibrant and the music enhanced the experience.

title: My tour was canceled by operator and I was lied to.
text: The tour ooerator canceled on me at the last minute. They did not inform me either. When my ride failed to appear, I called them and they said the Magic Fountain circuit was closed today. Since I was going to be in Lima one more day, I asked if I vould go tomorrow. . They said no. I checked on line for evidence of the Magic Fountain circuit being closed. None! I was lied to. I suspect I was the only one who signed up for the tour and they felt it was not worth it. I will get a refund but I am very angry. I had organized my day around this.

title: Waste of money
text: When I arrived at the location I did not know where to go. I called the number provided several times and no one answered. I messaged the organizer from the trip advisor app and received no responseOverall the experience was nice at the park but I totally wasted my money on the tour

title: Fountains
text: Alonso Ortiz was our guide. A very nice young man who gave us the story behind the fountain project. Best site in Lima !.....

title: ALTERNATIVA BUENA Y ECON√ìMICA
text: La mejor alternativa para ir de Lima al aeropuerto. Muy cumplidos, serios y econ√≥micos. Mientras un taxi te puede costar 50 soles, ellos te llevan por 16. Los puntos de embarque son estrat√©gicos y muy bien ubicados.REcomendado para quienes viajan solos.

title: Puntualidad
text: Confortables veh√≠culos, puntuales.Lo malo: poco aire acondicionado, sin cinturones de seguridad para todos los asientos y hay que tomarlo fuera del aeropuerto

title: Lovely tour of lima and the historic centre
text: Our tour guide Patrick was so lovely and informative ! He knew so much about everywhere we went. An amazing way to explore Lima and learn about the history! The pisco tasting was a fun part of the tour. Thank you :)

title: Great experience
text: We participated in the morning tour of the historic center of Lima. Great experience concluded with a Pisco tasting. Our guide Gema was very knowledgeable and nice. I highly recommend!

title: Great experience with Lima highlights tour
text: I booked the tour very short term to shorten the 12 hour stopover in Lima. I chose airport pickup (they pick you up at intl arrivals). I lucked out and was the only one on the tour. My tour guide was Melanie and she did a marvelous job. She speaks English fluently and was easy to talk to. She really put her heart into explaining everything about the places we visited. As far as I can tell this tour shows you the highlights of Lima and I would certainly recommend it wholeheartedly.

title: I really liked the tour city we followed the itinerary correctly and visited all points, recommend for chairs! Gr
text: Very good experience, helped my friend chairman all the way, many stories about Lima, very worth this experience

title: Excellent experience.
text: Very complete tour. We visited from the seawall through the Miraflores and Barranco neighborhoods to the beautiful Plaza de Armas. Stopping by the San Francisco Convent.

title: Knowing the center and history of Lima
text: We went with Bryan to take a tour of downtown Lima while explaining historical facts and curious facts about Lima and Peru. Very interesting and educational!Finally we have done a small tasting of different piscos, all of them delicious!

title: Very good time to spend on a layover in Lima
text: Proper pickup experience, and the commentaries by Patrick, starting at the arheological site, continued at the cathedral, catacomb and the main square were well on the spot! The drink tasting, even more the Miraflores views were great to experience! ... I can recommend this tour and Guide for anyone who is on a 6-8 hours layover and cannot go deeper because of that. It was much better than sitting at the airport. :)

title: Interesting tour of the center
text: Good experience with Patrick. The church part and interesting catacombs. The rest of the tour enjoyable with varied explanations.

title: Amazing experience ü§© and complete
text: We toured downtown Lima with Bryan Hoyos and it was spectacular! It was very complete, pleasant and super attentive. We couldn't have had a better guide. Then he solved doubts we had (ATMs, transportation, etc.), and recommended us a place to eat local food, come on, where he goes almost every day ü´∂üëè, amazing ü§© and at an even better price!

title: Excellent
text: Excellent guide, Bryan very knowledgeable, we were going slowly, really enjoying and understanding the tour, time to buy, try, take photos, etc.

title: Mini Stay in Lima
text: Wonderful experience, Jos√© Antonio our very prepared and attentive guide. The cozy place with very nice Christmas decoration, made it a little more emotional.

title: My experience in Magic Water Circuit and dinner show
text: I had an amazing experience with this tour of the Magic Water Circuit and dinner-show in Lima. The organization was impeccable and the service excellent. I would especially like to highlight my guide Roxanaü§ó, who made the tour something unique with his kindness, knowledge and willingness to answer all our questions. I highly recommend this tour and the agency, as they provide a quality service that exceeds expectationsüîù. I will definitely choose them again for future experiences!ü§©

title: Magic water and dinner tour
text: We had a great time the water show was an experience and the dinner show was pure fun and exciter, Roxana was out guide and she made sure everything went smoothly, very fun personality I had the most fun and laughter with her, I‚Äôd relive that tour especially the dinner. Thanks Roxana!!!!!!

title: Must see!
text: We had a private tour with Roxanne. She showed us all around the park and made sure we had a good spot for the water show. I was nervous to go by myself and daughter so having Roxanne made me feel safe and secure.

title: Super recommended!
text: Excellent all the equipment! Both the coordination, the driver and especially the guide!!! Pamela knew a lot and was always very willing

title: A fantastic night
text: The Magic Water Circuit show was fantastic. It saw fountain shows in Vegas and Barcelona but this one was very unique with video stories projected on the fountains. The tour guide was good. He took us to see almost everywhere in the park where there were so many things to see. He told us the history of the park. He gave good tips on recording the show.The dinner show was also good, although the horse demonstration was cancelled because the original restaurant closed and we changed to another one where there were only dancing show. The food was good and the dancing show was fantastic. The dancers demonstrated 6 dances from different parts of Peru. After their performance, the dancers invited the travelers to dance and have photos taken with them.
keywords: ['magic water circuit', 'fountain show', 'dancing show', 'tour guide', 'peru', 'dancers', 'park', 'dinner show', 'photos', 'history']

title: Wonderful evening in Lima.
text: Spectacular evening. The water show was amazing. The dinner show after the Magic Water Circuit was phenomenal. The tour guide was interactive and informative all evening make the experience enjoyable.

title: A beautiful night
text: Fun night! The water fountains are amazing and its nice having a local to talk to while walking around all the fountains. The dinner show was canceled for me but they took mw to a small restaurant in Barranco and I ate anticuchos, picarrones, and drank a pisco sour. It was a beautiful night.

title: Very accommodating.
text: The staff was extremely helpful and accommodating when our flight to Lima was cancelled and we had to reorganize at the last minute. They were very responsive and flexible with our changing situation and helped us work out a new plan. Thanks!

title: AWESOME!!
text: Abraham and David were amazing! They are both super friendly and knowledgeable which made for a wonderful day! Abraham was a very good teacher and had us up and going down the dunes relatively easily. He took his time to explain the process and captured so many awesome photos and videos of us during our time!

title: Wonderful Experience
text: AMAZING! A unique and great experience, I went with my 12 year old daughter without any experience and they were SUPER PROFESSIONAL! Super recommended!!!

title: Great experience
text: The experience has been very good. The attention, patience and class has been extensive.Suddenly time is fast and maybe when I finally do you are dominating it is over, but it is very worth it.

title: Amazing day on the dunes!
text: Had a great time learning to sandboard with Abraham! Never snowboarded before but with some coaching from Abraham was able to surf the dunes! We had the dunes all to ourselves and it was spectacular. Our kids (18 and 20) said after Machu Picchu this was the highlight of our trip to Peru. Would do this excursion again and truly recommend going with Nomada and Abraham.

title: Lime Peru Sandboarding
text: Wow! This excursion was outstanding. N√≥mada takes you close to Lima and there is more than enough Dune to ride. The four wheel drive trip onto the sand was beautiful and worth the price on its own, but what really makes this 5 star are the people. The drivers and guides love what they do and it shows through in the fun we had together.

title: Unreal time - great guides!
text: Went into the experience not knowing what to expect. The expectations were blown out of the water. Beautiful terrain and awesome group of guides. Our group ranged from beginners to experienced snowboarders, all of whom received the necessary guidance and were able to shred! Highly recommended these guys!

title: Don‚Äôt go Huacachina! DO THIS.
text: This experience was surprisingly amazing! I read some bad reviews about Huacachina Oasis and decided not to waste 12 hours on transportation to go there. This Sandboarding experience not only just took 1 hour transportation, but also gave a much better sand dune experience!! It has amazing sand dune view (no other people at all!!!! Imagine your own private sand dune). because it is shortened transportation time, we were able to get but much longer sandboarding experience with private instructor. Huacachina‚Äôs sandboarding does not allow you to do stand up (need extra cost) and does not have proper instructor.Our instructor is Abraham. He was very friendly and very experienced instructor. With him, we were able to take fantastic videos and photos.Lastly, because it was half day, we were able to back to hotel around 2pm, took a nice shower and enjoyed sand-free lunch and ocean walk (remember, after sandboarding, your whole body will be covered by sand. If from Huacachina, you will need bear with all the sand for another 6 hour transportation before you can get relaxed)Overall, definitely recommend this experience and recommend this operator.

title: I recommend!
text: I never snow did snow board or sandboard before, but the guide was very helpful, patient and we had a lot of fun. (It's was easy to learn fast!) I recommend even four a family!!

title: Incredible experience!!
text: We had the best experience ever! Abraham was a wonderful guide! He was patient and understanding and he helped us take perfect pictures! Thank you N√≥mada Boards and experience!

title: Thrilling
text: It‚Äôs was awesome‚Ä¶. The trip was long but worth it. You have plenty time to sleep to recuperate from all the fun. Don‚Äôt eat before the boat tut for fear of sea sickness. It was an excellent way to end my trip in Per√∫. One of the better experiences thus far.

title: Excellent Service
text: Excellent attention from the agency throughout the process, especially from the guide who accompanied us. We were able to enjoy all the activities with family and without effort.

title: A great experience
text: Tour very complete, comfortable and unmissable. The guide is very attentive and manages the times well allowing to take advantage of all that the plan offers

title: Excellent and highly recommended
text: We did the Paracas-Huacachina tour with Inca Trilogy Tours and it was an amazing experience from start to finish. From the attention by message and in office to the organization of the tour, everything was excellent. Our guide Dave was always watching the group, providing clear information and making the tour very enjoyable. Lunch and pisco tasting in the restaurant were delicious, with super attentive staff. The desert walk was very well organized and the price of the tour is totally worth it. Highly recommended 100%, especially with Dave as guide.

title: The best tour to paracas and Huacachina
text: Excellent tour, crossbow islands, huacachina and paracas, excellent guide Davi, amazing information and very rich food. 100%. Recommended!

title: Recommended
text: Very good experience, I highly recommend it! the trip was very comfortable and if you are in Lima I highly recommend it as a day activity

title: ICA & Paracas tour
text: If you have a few days to know Peru, I highly recommend it, it takes full advantage of the day, very good organization and Davi super good host.

title: A recommended combo of navigation and buggi x ols medanos.
text: Highly recommended, very friendly guide, fair explanations, worth the hours of travel. Pure adrenaline, impeccable driving, rich eating and full day. If or if sunscreen, sunglasses and cap. Everywhere there are toilletes (clean) and you can buy drink. I clearly bought a silver ring at a stop.

title: All great
text: Good logistics, all very organized. There is also a good selection of places to eat and carry out activities. I recommend it.

title: A day packed with adventure and beauty
text: I'm from South AustraliaThis day was beyond my expectations, it had it all!Early start to the day, comfortable bus with USB charging and air-conditioning.Included history, nature, sightseeing, excitement and adventure . With a great tour guide Davi, everyone spoke Spanish, but not me.Davi made me feel comfortable and safe in a foreign country. I recommend this tour if you have time in Lima

title: Good
text: Pick up to and from the hotel, it‚Äôs wonderful arrangement. During the trip, guide Patrick showed us around with knowledge and humour. We had a wonderful experience and good to know more about the history with comfortable transportation.

title: Historical Lima
text: Patric was a wonderfull guide. The tour through miraflores and the historicam part of Lima was complete and very interesting! Definitely would recomend

title: Lima tour
text: Perfect for a spanish/english speaker with Patrick as a tour guide. Gracias ‚ú®If you want to avoid the traffic then this would be a mix. Moving by car was way easier than just walking through.

title: Excellent
text: Patrick an excellent guide. I met and enjoyed the whole tour. The catacombs were the best part of the trip. Recommended

title: I recommend!!
text: Great!! Initial contact via WhatsApp is great for re-confirming the tour and removing any questions. The catacombs tour is super complete with entry included! Patrick very friendly and great guide!! I recommend

title: I recommend
text: The tour was very good! We passed all points calmly. Patrick, the guide, very attentive, kind and very mastery of the subject!

title: Excellent with patrick
text: Excellent tour patrick the best guide in the world God protect him and always have guides just like him who always taught us the history of the ancestors

title: Cultural Tour that allowed me to know the catacombs
text: Wonderful experience. Patrick is a cultured person who knows the history of Peru very well. I hope to return to Peru to expand my knowledge.

title: Great tour!
text: Such a great experience and a fun way to see the city! Patrick was very knowledgeable and we loved hearing all of his fun stories!

title: Great tour!
text: Very well organised and informative tour of Lima old town! Our guide Melanie was great and made the experience very enjoyable.

title: Amazing Day Trip with Friends
text: I went on the full-day trip to Paracas and Huacachina with my friends, and it was one of the best tours we‚Äôve done in Peru. The boat ride to Ballestas Island was exciting, and we got to see so much wildlife. Later, the sandboarding and dune buggy ride in Huacachina were unforgettable full of fun and adventure. The trip was well organized, the guide was helpful, and it was a perfect day to enjoy with friends.

title: A nice surprise
text: Great tour! We came with no expectations, but it was actually really great and a good deal for the money.The guide was nice and really flexible with schedule and we got time to enjoy every part of the tour!The degustacion which was some random extra activity which we didn't care much about, revealed itself to be actually one of the highlight of the trip, with great explainations and many nice tastings.Totally recommended

title: Never again
text: i think this trip can t be improved..all in all a Desaster when you compare the price with the experience...30 second Photostop at huachina..almost 9 hours of driving and 2 hours waiting timeIn my Personal top 3 of the worst Trip ever done

title: Perfect 1 day out of Lima
text: The tour was well paced. Transportation was comfortable and timely. We had enough time in each stops and we were blessed with good weather so no big waves  while in Paracas and it was tolerable in the Desert. Had a great lunch and Pisco tasting in Ica.

title: Had a great experience!
text: I decided to take this tour just the afternoon before and grateful I made that decision. It was the cheapest tour I could find and I got more out than I would have expected. Everyone was super helpful and even tho I booked on short notice I got picked up from my hotel. The places we visited were simply amazing. We had a 90 minute boat ride were we saw penguins, sea lions and the nasca lines. Afterwards we visited Huacachina and had an amazing 2 hours Buggy ride in the gorgeous desert, including sandboarding. Our guide was great, super friendly, did a lot of explanations and helped wherever he could.The restaurants were we stopped were all carefully picked and affordable, from the tiny roadside breakfast place with freshly made typical Peruvian breads, to the lunch place where we got a short wine tour, including free samples. I had an amazing day and can totally recommend to take this tour!

title: ATTENSION: DO NOT JOIN THIS TOUR, TERRIBALE SERVICE, UNPROFESSIONAL
text: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!After paid and confirmation from viatour, we waited for our hotel pick up time from the tour company. no communication whatsoever, then we tried to call, dirctly to voice mail. Tour day, we waited at hotel lobby at 4:45am, then we have got call at 5:15am from tour company, that our tour has been canceled due to inefficent people join.They offer us to pay extra 30US dollar per person for a private tour.THIS IS NOT A TOUR COMPANY, THEY ARE FRAUD, LEAVE YOU TO THE LAST MINUTE, GIVE YOU NO CHOICE THEN ASK YOU FOR MORE MONEY.If you read my review and still join this tour, good luck my friend, to prepare for your miserable and unperfesional service.

title: Don√¢¬Ä¬ôt understand the importance from a tourist visiting in.
text: As a tourist we plan our visit to the country in a schedule time. Unfortunately this tour was cancelled at the last minute by the tour company due other people from the tour group have got sick, we understand and we are sorry that the others couldn√¢¬Ä¬ôt attend the tour but that is not our problem and we were ready to go. The tour company cancelled and suggest us to pay extra $35 each if we still want to attend the tour, meaning they would be able to do the tour but they won√¢¬Ä¬ôt because others won√¢¬Ä¬ôt attend which we think is unfair. Although We tried to negotiate paying for one the extra charge and attending two which they denied and cancelled the tour, disregarding us totally and not seeing our point of view as a tourist. We are very disappointed the way we were treated.

title: Great and social trip
text: This is a really well-organised and intensive trip!We visit the islands outside of Paracas, the desert in Huacachina and Pisco-destillery in the end.It is a day-trip from Lima, which means that it is possible to explore a lot in a limited time.The guiding is very good, and the guests are an international mix, making it possible to make new friends. The trip is done by a minibus, so the group size is also not too largeThe trip lasts a long time. We left the hotel at 5am and was back at 10pm, so I recommend to bring a bag with things that you could possible need for a long day by the seaside and in the desert

title: Horrible Experience
text: I bought two tickets to this experience and when I showed up there was no one there and all of the doors were chain locked. I have been trying to get ahold of them for a week to either reschedule for when they are open or get a refund. I have left both voicemails and emails and no one has responded to me. 0/10 recommend

title: A magical Peruvian experience!
text: I learned a lot about Peruvian gastronomy and culture, and I really enjoyed Peruvian experience, it was my first time eating Peruvian food so I loved it!Staff was extremely kind and made me feel as if I were at home, especially Andres, who had his eyes on us all the time during the whole experience, he was also very patient when answering all our questions. He made me feel at ease!100% recommended!

title: Family vacation
text: If you visit Peru and want to find out more about their culture this is one of the places to go and do it. Tells you a lot about their history and culture

title: Excelente for Solo Travelers
text: The Peruvian experience was amazing and worth the money. The guides are able to present in bother English and Spanish. If you are traveling alone, having a group experience is nice. I never felt like I wasn't a part of the group, during the tour, and it was super fun to get to know new people. Pro tip: the chocolate museum (el museo de choc√≥) near parque Kennedy has 25% off coupons for the experience. Also, if you're a foreigner, do not forget your passport or a picture of your passport to participate in the experience. Enjoy!

title: Magnifique !
text: Very well done and super fun :) As a Peruvian I totally enjoyed discovering the influences of foreign cultures into our cuisine,

title: Excellent Experience!
text: Me and my family got together in Lima and went together to the Peruvian Experience since it was very well recommended to us. We really had a great time and is surpassed every expectation. Top quality!

title: Awesome Experience!
text: Came to Peruvian Experience with business colleagues. Had an outstanding time learning about gastronomy, history, and culture of Peru. A must visit!

title: Incredible Highlight Tour of Peruvian Cuisine and Culture!
text: I recently visited the Peruvian Experience with my wife and a few friends. We did the full guided tour, which covers some cultural background information similar to a museum, a series of short movies, a Pisco Sour cocktail workshop, a "make your own ceviche" cooking workshop and then a tasting of the most representative dishes of Peru.We really had a great time and the two hours went by very fast. The staff was incredibly friendly and joyful. The food was amazing, and I certainly recommend not eating prior to this tour, as you will be getting a very full meal.I recommend this tour to anybody visiting Lima. The price is excellent in comparison to what you receive and you will have a great time.

title: Worth every penny!
text: We had a great time. The hospitality was second to none. The whole staff was very enthusiastic and really enjoyed their jobs. The food was excellent. Overall it was a tremendous experience.

title: Incredible Experience!!!!!
text: 7+ stars... Amazing staff- with Cesar as our guideüòä Highly recommended for every visitor to Lima!! My mouth/taste buds have been stimulated like never before in such an unexpectedly fantastic way!

title: Magic experience
text: An amazing and magical place to visit with friends, plus you can take good photos and have a unique experience!! I recommend it.

title: Exciting
text: Very good overall service from the whole team. It was an interesting walk full of history. The widely recommended

title: Awesome day, awesome guide!
text: We had such a great time on the tour with Juan as our guide! He was super knowledgeable about the history of the site and shared it in a really interesting way that kept us hooked. Juan‚Äôs storytelling made the ancient cultures feel so real. The tour was well-planned, with plenty of chances to explore and ask all the questions we had. We left with a whole new appreciation for Peru‚Äôs history. Big thanks to Juan for making the day so fun and memorable!

title: Great tour
text: I was very pleased to be in this tour. Me and my family enjoy it and learn about te peruvian culture. It was a really nice experience and recomend it!

title: EXCELLENT!
text: Great trip especially because IFB the service provided. Very friendly, informed and charismatic persons with a particular way of traveling, really unique. 100% recommended.

title: Huaca Tours
text: Great tour of the huacas in pachacamac and Lima, very friendly guide, awesome food and very knowledgeable of the history of these pre inca civilization. I recommend it to everyone.

title: Amazing tour
text: Excellent service!! Super friendly people, they helped us with everything we needed. Everything was on time too. I would absolutely recommend this tour for anyone.

title: A very
text: Nacho is an amazing guide, and the tour was very well organized! He speaks good english, and is easy to communicate with! He gives a detailed description of the history of the ruins, while keeping it interesting. He also answered every question we had along the way.Me and my friend was very pleased with the tour. Worth every penny!

title: Great experience
text: I loved my tour with our guide Nacho! Communication before was effortless and everything was organised really well. On other tours I sometimes have trouble staying interested throughout the whole thing, but our guide was so funny and engaging it was impossible to get distracted. Would highly recommend!

title: Very good tour
text: I definitely recommend this tour, the guide is very well prepared and pleasant to stay with, I very enjoyed my time, if you have the chance give it a chance you'll not regret it

title: line cutting in the DR
text: The women there think nothing of cutting in front of you in line. for them its a rite of passage. to deny the gringo of his place in line. Im not one for taking things lying down. A young woman rudely butted in line and went ahead of me, she looked back at me, silently daring me to say something while she arrogantly preened herself, thinking i would do nothing. I said, in Spanish, "Excuse me, I didn't wait here for half an hour to be cut off in line. Move it or lose it," She was shocked that a gringo could speak her language and call her on her rudeness. She bowed her head and apologized and quickly disappeared. It just goes to show that rudeness, if it is allowed to fester, takes root in the culture as "normal".

title: Lots of Creepy Fun!
text: We had an absolute blast with our guide Renzo! We were picked us up at our Airbnb, which was very convenient and appreciated.It was just the three of us so we got a delightfully personalized tour. We love the creepy and macabre, and so does Renzo, so he was excited to give us all the details (and we also shared our favorite horror movies). The catacombs at the monastery were fascinating. The cemetery portion was also fantastic as we got to hear all kinds of stories about some of the (in)famous residents, from presidents to witches to miracle children.Overall, we highly recommend this tour!

title: Don‚Äôt miss one of the most beautiful parts of the city. Not creepy at all, it was beautiful
text: This was a fantastic to hear. You start out for the best rate in a very high-class bus from your hotel to the Sittercity, you get to see the central plaza in old town which is marvelous. Unfortunately, due to Covid, it was closed he could not walk through it but you could see it from all angles from the sides. Architecture was fantastic and meet for some great photos. He then proceeded to an old church and get a tour of the church, followed by the catacombs underneath with your full of bones from several hundred  years. This is a fascinating tour underneath the church, through old brick lined tunnels and passages.After that, a bus ride again. You go to an old abandoned cemetery which is absolutely beautiful. In other cities, they would charge a huge amount to tour these lovely statuary and old Graves. Arturo was able to point out interesting characters from the history of Peru buried here. This included several past presidents, and other large mausoleums which were amazing to see.Whole tour was about 45 hours and definitely money well spent. One of most beautiful parts of the city, and apparently no one goes here ‚Äì we were the only people on the cemetery part of the tour in the entire cemetery, which seems to be miles in each dimension. I would say this is a don‚Äôt miss tour.

title: Great tour with nice people
