text: We had a bike tour woth Paolo and Manuel. We had a great time, Paolo is very friendly and has always a smile on his face. I can definitely recommend this experience

title: RecommendednTour
text: Good experience! Bikes pretty new! Tour with nice views. Guides Marevick and Silvana attentive and did a perfect tour!

title: 2 thumbs up
text: Fun little bike tour in the neighbourhood. Leonardo was great.. funny! Showed us pics of him and the local mural artists.Traffic at times was a bit unnerving on the bike.

title: Lovely Day Out On Bikes
text: Hello! I wanted to share my review - this was a really lovely tour that me and my friend went on.The tour guide and his colleague were very accommodating as I was too short for the normal bikes and they got me a bike that was suitable - it was very kind of them.The tour was beautiful and a great idea - although I was apprehensive about the tour as a for non cyclist (it‚Äôs been years and I‚Äôm scared of cars on the road) - the journey was extremely safe and accessible. They also always waited for me at a safe point if I got too far behind. (And they didn‚Äôt shame me for being slow which was nice.)The tour guide was knowledgeable about the city and could answer our questions. He was very agreeable about taking pictures for us at scenic spots. We saw a lot in the space of 3 hours, and it informed our trip afterwards as we were able to easily go on the same route for a walk the day after. Thanks so much and am recommending this to any friends that also go to Lima ! :-D

title: Highly recommend this to anyone visiting Lima!
text: Excellent trip with an awesome guide! The tour took us through some beautiful areas of Lima on mostly bike specific lanes

title: Enjoyable trip
text: This tour is a great way to experience two lovely Lima neighbours, especially if you‚Äôre short on time. Maverick was a super guide too.

title: Great bike tour in Lima, and in the districts of Mira, Flores and Barranco
text: Maverick was excellent and gave us great information about the city along with the bike tour. He was very knowledgeable and patient with us as we had small children.

title: Wonderful Introduction to Miraflores/Barranco
text: Our guide Aron was knowledgeable and so friendly and we learned so much interesting information about Miraflores and Barranco as well as his other recommendations about food and things to see in Lima (we followed all of them and he did not steer us wrong!). We did this trip on our first morning in Lima to get our bearings and it was so, so helpful. Unlike some other cities (ahem, Madrid) the bike lanes are plentiful and well placed so it was a very relaxed and enjoyable ride with our teenager. Highly recommend!

title: Good Introduction to Area
text: An entertaining way to see these areas, avoids traffic but covers more ground than on foot. Mostly on bike paths. Our guide Silvana was full of fun and informative. The riding is not strenuous and the paths are generally flat. Views over ocean are wonderful.

title: Great way to get orientated.
text: Paulo was a very friendly and knowledgeable guide. Great way to spend our first morning in Peru. Felt very safe on bikes and nice way to see Miraflores and Barranco.

title: Great experience
text: Our tour to Pachacamac was given by Cesar, Silvana and Cirilo. We had a great time visiting the place and got very interesting explanations.

title: Tour a Pachacamac
text: Amazing tour of Acllawasi, temple of the sun, painted temple and the pyramids with ramp at Pachacamac. The Service of the driver Cirilo and the guide Cesar was very good.
Very good explanation about the excavations of Pachacamac.The museum is beautiful and very well built. Leonardo our handler was very driven.

title: Highly recommended for history on Pre-Inca to Inca eras
text: We were booked for a shared tour and we ended up by ourselves with the guide and driver. It was awesome! Plus our guide, Paula, was amazing and such a wealth of knowledge with the history of the area and when walking the Pachacamac Pyramids tour. She was our tour guide yesterday as well on the Lima Half day city walking tour. It was wonderful to have her as our guide again. Highly recommended tour if you enjoy history as much as we do.

title: Great
text: We had a great time. Saul our guide was great, full of information and it ended up being a private tour as we were the only couple during the tour. I would highly recommend this tour.

title: Excellent trip
text: Very interesting place excellent chauffeur and even better the guide. We had an amazing time and learned a lot about this culture

title: Good experience
text: We had a good tour with I think JB. Very friendly and good knowledge. Picked us up on time and delivered us back to the hotel with no hassles

title: Tour in archeological site
text: The tour was great. The pick up was in time with a very comfortable car. The site is very interesting, with a museum and the archeological site itself. The full tour was a half day. Gabriela and Isaac were the guide and the driver respectively. Both were very attentive and amable.

title: Amazing tour with Cesar
text: Amazing tour with Cesar who is a kind, approacheable and very knowledgeable guide. I learnt so much on the day about the past history whilst also having a lot of fun. I highly recommend this tour and Cesar as a guide. It is a second time I am doing a tour with him and I can't recommend him enough for exceptional tours.

title: Historic ruins close to the city
text: A great company with great guides and drivers. Gaby was excellent and had amazing knowledge about Pachamaca. Thanks to Luis our driver! Haku- your philanthropic endeavours are admirable!

title: Bad experiences
text: Teacher did not come and did not respond to the WhatsApp message. The meeting place was also very comical on a main road.

title: Dancing in the park
text: We enjoyed our lesson in the park and Luis was very patient. I would like to have learned more bachata moves though.

Luis was amazing from the very beginning. He taught me salsa terminology and different styles of dancing. He is a patient, very relaxed , and pleasant to be around.  He is able to break down complex moves into simpler ones for his students. He also offered to show me around around Lima, and showed me some places that only locals would know! In addition, he took me to Barranco, pachacamac, al circuito del agua, Lima downtown, the beach, surquillo mercado and many more places !! He also made great recommendations and took me to the best places to try authentic Peruvian food. Luis went above and beyond the salsa class to make my experience in Lima an incredible and unforgettable one.

title: Great salsa dancing in a park
text: Great teacher - who had with him an additional trainer/partner - that learned us the basic of salsa is a fun way. We had not realised the lesson was in a park outside but it was fun (but would had been good to know)

title: Salsa lessons
text: Luis is an amazing teacher!! We were blessed to stumble upon him when looking for private salsa lessons. He speaks both English and Spanish and he is extremely passionate about what he teaches with a friendly personality. He is very easy to work with.  Luis can teach anyone how to dance!  If you do private lessons with him, he will also invite you to his dance studio to socialize with other salsa dancers

title: Awesome Private Salsa Lessons!
text: This past month my friend Carly and I have been taking private salsa classes with Luis. I highly recommend him to ANYONE looking to learn more! He has group classes and will also do privates, he even came to our apartment building to teach us up 2-3 times a week! Hes a former pro salsa dancer and he is incredibly talented, professional, super patient, and even helped us practice our Spanish and meet locals while we were here. I have ALWAYS wanted to learn how to be a good dancer, and this year I made it my official New Years Resolution to actually try! I have no rhythm, cant count music, and am taller than most men I've ever danced with so.... it seemed like a pretty hopeless resolution, but I'm now this much closer to not looking like a crazy person on the dance floor, thanks to Luis. Our month in Lima wouldn't have been the same without him, he truly made it a million times better and we had so much fun with him!!!

title: Super fun, safe, and memorable day on the sand dunes!
text: Rafa and his Sandride Lima crew were amazing! We started with an early 7am pick up from our hotel in a nice clean comfortable SUV. An hour later we were getting our boots and board sized then we hoped into a Toyota Landcruiser and headed out to the desert.  They let us pick the music and within 40 min we were in the middle of the sand dunes.They did a wonderful job at starting us off slowly on some smaller dunes until we got comfortable with riding and turning. Driving on the soft sand is not easy but they did an awesome job getting us most of the way up the dune after each run so we only had to walk a short distance to the top.They also took photos and video of us while riding which made for some super memorable photos.Would 100% recommend and book Sandride Lima again!

One of the best days I've had ever......and I've done alot of cool stuff!!   The guys were amazing!  10000% recommend!Rafa and Alfonso were so patient and took some amazing video footage of me and my friends!
name: Lima Sandboarding

title: A Must Try Experience!
text: Awesome trip! If you‚Äôre looking for a unique experience during your Per√∫ visit this is it! Great pre-trip communication, helpful instruction during trip and friendly trip leaders. All around great experience!

title: Such a fun experience!
text: A must do in Lima! We had best time! Alfonso and Javier were great. Even with no experience at all, they show you exactly how to sandboard.

title: Amazing experience
text: Absolutely phenomenal experience. They catered to every need the entire time and gave me tailored feedback to improve my riding. They are a fun bunch and we had a great time boarding and off roading a bit in the 4x4 absolutely will be back for more.

title: Out of this world experience!
text: The experience was incredible! It‚Äôs really crazy to be out in huge dunes so close to the city! The team took super good care of us and gave us tips and tricks along the way. The videos were really great too!

title: Great time!
text: Great experience. Alfonso and Javier were great guides! It was well worth it! We did about 8 or 9 runs and got great photos and videos

title: Half day sand boarding tour
text: Incredible trip and the guide/tutor (Alfonso) was excellent. Explained everything perfectly and took awesome pics üì∏

title: Unreal
text: Great trip for anyone and everyone, very hospitable and professional. Great videos and pictures, guides were very knowledgeable and English was great!

title: Amazing Experience
text: Amazing experience! I had no sandboarding experience, but the team was so helpful and patient! Seeing the dunes was incredible. Would highly recommend

title: Fantastic Desert Tour
text: We took this two day tour with Alex and Esterling and had a wonderful time. We would book with them again and recommend the experience. The sites were fantastic: the oasis was beautiful and the buggy ride and sand boarding was so fun. I get severe motion sickness and Dramamine did the trick here. Alex recommended so many delicious restaurants, and we had great meals thanks to him. He was very attentive and helpful, and we felt so taken care of. The Nazca lines were an incredible experience but my Dramamine didn‚Äôt work here but the ride is only about 30 minutes. We especially loved seeing the wildlife around Ballestas Islands and really enjoyed the tour of the Paracas National Reserve. But really Alex and Esterling made it such a great experience. They were so kind and friendly, proud of Peru and Peruvian culture, and made sure we had a great time. There is a lot of driving on this tour but in the morning you can sleep and you can also see a lot by driving around. Esterling was also a fantastic driver and so kind to us. We felt so taken care of and had a wonderful time!

title: An unforgettable experience
text: There are no words to describe the impeccable 100 points out of 100 experience we had in Peru thanks to Peruvian Worldwide Tours. Beyond the magical places we knew, one as a tourist needs the experience and expertise to get to know him better. And they certainly have itIt's what we found from minute zero in Jean, Renzo, Alex and Sterling.Renzo led us through Lima with his storiesWith our guide Alex and escort Sterling we shared two days knowing magical places like Nazca, Huacachina (must see!!!!) Cahuachi and Ballestas Islands .Hopefully you have the chance to meet this wonderful team of caring, polite, containerizing and fun people!Total thanks üá¶üá∑ for the laughter and adventures and for addressing our concerns

title: Incredible!!!
text: Excellent experience! Very good attention from our guide. Recommended to take something for motion sickness before the flight in Nazca

title: AN ULTIMATE BUCKET LIST EXPERIENCE
text: I just returned from ‚ÄúMysterious Nazca Lines & Huacachina Oasis - Exclusive and Unique Excursion.‚Äù It was a fabulous experience.My guide, Gorki V., is the best: He is deeply knowledgeable and enthusiastic; his pride in Peru  is infectious; he gave clear explanations of the complex history and significance of the sites; he made the itinerary run smoothly at the airport and at the oasis, places that can be a bit confusing for a first-time visitor. And he is a very decent human being who made the entire experience fun. Viator/Peruvian Worldview tours should clone Gorki and have him do all of their Peru tours.The plane ride over the Nasca Lines  exceeded expectations. It was a smooth flight (no one experienced air sickness) of about half an hour‚Äîplenty of time to see each of the petroglyphs. The pilots pointed out (in Spanish and English) exactly where to look and passed over each petroglyph twice so passengers on the right and left could each get a good view. My advice is to put your camera away and look out the windows the whole time and enjoy the spectacle. My photos were a waste because the contrast of the carved lines to the barren stone doesn‚Äôt show well in photos.Do not fail to take full advantage of Huacachina Oasis! The dune buggy ride was crazy fun and the sand boarding even more exciting. Gorki took great videos of me sliding down ridiculously steep slopes.Yes, there is no denying that the round trip (1000km!) drive from Lima is exhausting to do in one day, as some other clients have posted. Yeah, it‚Äôs an issue. But, IMHO, it‚Äôs a better (if imperfect)  alternative than making this into a two day trip. The car was comfortable, and the driver, Ernesto, very professional. The trip gives a sense of the remarkable desert geography and a revealing glimpse into the challenging conditions of rural life outside cosmopolitan Lima.

title: So much fun!
text: If you are visiting Lima, do not miss your chance at seeing the Nazca lines - they are incredible to see from the air. Seeing the geoglyphs makes this tour already worth the time - then add on the stop at Huacachina and this tour is a no-brainer! The dune buggy ride was so much fun! Highly recommend. Thanks to Mario for being an excellent tour guide and Juan was an incredible driver! Definitely book this tour!

title: Great tour - Mario was a great guide
text: Our family of five took this group tour without knowing much what to expect.  Our guide Mario was fantastic in telling us about Incan and other Peruvian history and was a great host guiding us through the Nazca Lines air tour and Huacachina Oasis sand buggy and sand boarding adventures. It‚Äôs a time commitment to do this trip but if you‚Äôre in Peru, this is one of those things that afterwards you‚Äôll say ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad I did that‚Äù.

title: The trip over Nazca was great. Also huacachina was so much fun with the buggy and sandboardung
text: It was a very long day and a long drive but very  comfortable.Marcos is a really good tour guide.it was a really fun and enjoyable

title: This tour was the highlight of our trip in Peru!
text: We had an amazing day touring Huacachina and seeing the Nazca lines. Marcos was a great tour guide and Juan kept us safe while driving! We got picked up around 6 am and headed straight to the oasis. Marcos taught us a lot of interesting facts about Lima, Ica and Peru in general. We had the absolute best time ever on the sand dunes. We were smiling eat today ear. The Nazca lines were also great. The plane was a little crazy, since they fly in zig zags for both sides to see the lines. It was still incredible. This has been the highlight of our 2 months in South America. I would 1000% recommended this tour to anyone who is looking to explore Peru!

title: Great tour guide and memorable ecperiense
text: It was a wonderful experience. It's a long day tour but it was worth your time. Flying over the Nasca line, driving over the sand dunes, sand boarding, everything was so fun. He taught us a lot of facts of Peru and Inca Civilization. title: Great tour guide and decent company
text: Spent a good 16 hours traveling from Lima to take the fly over Nasca line. Then did the Buggy car driving over the sand dunes in Huacachina. The sand boarding is fun! My guide Manuel is friendly and professional! Really enjoyed the tour.

title: Tour of downtown Lima
text: Marco was knowledgeable, kind, and patient. He took pictures of us anytime I requested it.He is a great guide!I learned a lot by listening to him.

title: Great tour
text: Renzo was an excellent guide and very knowledgeable. He had a great sense of humor and brought a different perspective on the significance of everything we encountered. Our driver Sterling was very professional and got us around with no issues.

title: Great tour - friendly guide
text: Great tour - friendly guide. Would do it again. Beautiful sunshine, good weather, no food but good wine, nice city, convenient location, old museum, cool gold.
