title: Wonderful intro to Peruvian percussion!
text: Excellent experience! Paloma translated perfect instruction from Jesus and included the origins of both the instruments and the African slaves that developed them after their native drums were burned by the Spanish in an effort to destroy their culture and replace it with Catholism. Jesus was very patient and detailed as he instructed me on the principal instruments. Great time with wonderful people in a space that is developing into a community resource for emerging artists.

title: OMG My kids had SOOOO much fun
text: I just did this event on 15 of feb 2020. It was amazing!.  I am traveling with 8 children ages 11-15.  7 out of the 8 kids loooved it.  The 8th was exhausted and not musically oriented but he was still happy to film his friends.The kids covered so much material in such a short time and were really able to enjoy themselves.A large range of instruments were allowed to be tried.Paloma was positive and reinforcing but knew how to maintain control of the class (kids were easy to get excited and on a tangent).Fiorella, the business partner- was great to deal with.  She agreed to come to my airbnb and came at a time that was reasonable for my children.. I have traveled to Peru over 6 times in the past 10 years and this is the top thing in LIma I've had my kids do..  I will be booking it again for our next trip!

title: Would 100% recommend.
text: It was an extraordinary experience, which also felt very safe. Our driver, Carlos was very friendly and responsible making the experience easy and smooth. We started with the Tacama vineyard where we tasted wine and pisco, had the tour to the wine making processes, great lunch and also watched a horse show. Afterwards we took the car to the oasis and did the Sandhills and Sand-boarding experience. It was really awesome. I would definitely recommend this service.

title: Fun buggy tour
text: The Buggy tour was fun and the staff were friendly. I would not book with Travel Adventures Peru (TAP) anymore. We did not an itinerary and they would not return any phone calls or texts when we asked questions. We were picked up by random Peruvians who could not communicate with us in English (after TAP said that they would have someone who could speak English) so we just had to trust that they were taking us where we were supposed to go. We didn't know how long anything was going to take, how long he drive would be. Our driver was falling asleep on the way and we felt so uncomfortable that we said we needed a restroom break just so that he could wake up for the rest of the drive. He was nice but we were still nervous and tried to contact TAP but they never answered. I would do the buggy tours again but with I recommend Peru Hop. They were VERY nice organized. Could do without Tacama vineyard, but Nietto was fun.

title: A perfect day!
text: This was one of the most beautiful tourist activities we did during our stay in Peru. Ica was the perfect place to escape the cold of Lima and have fun in the Huacachina desert and of course enjoy wine and pisco in the beautiful Tacama vineyard.

title: Awesome full day in Tacama and Huacachina
text: This was an awesome tour which started from Lima. Our guide Jose was great at explaining every interesting fact. Tacama, which is the oldest vineyard in South America, is located 15 minutes from the city center. This vineyard produces some of the best wines of Peru and has a great restaurant which offers tasty Peruvian dishes. In the other hand, Huacachina is where the huge dunes are. We had a lot of fun riding a 4WD dune buggy for 2 hours and using the boards to slide on the sand. We recommend booking this tour.

title: A great day
text: A lot of fun and the best way to spend a day in Lima, the driver and tour guide were amazing, excellent trip and lovely views in the desert and vineyards. The food was delicious and Alejandro (the tour guide) gave us a lot of information about the places.

title: A perfect day trip from Lima
text: We only had one more day before flying home and wanted to get out of Lima to explore a bit more. This trip let us have an amazing day. We went from Lima to Tacama vineyard, it took around 4 hours to get there but the landscape was beautiful and our tour guide Jose shared a lot of interesting information. Tacama is the oldest vineyard in south America and that is one of the facts that attracted us. We did a tasting tour followed but a delicious lunch. After the vineyard we went to Huacachina which is definitely a must do in Peru. Huacachina is an oasis surrounded by palm trees exactly like in the desert movies. Our tour included a dune buggy tour through Huacachina‚Äôs desert which ended up with a great view of the sunset. The way back to Lima felt pretty fast since we were all tired and felt sleep. We honestly recommend doing this trip and we thanks this company and Jose for making our day.

title: All we had was fruit
text: After weeks of communication to tailor a personalized private food tour we finally made it to Lima and met with our guide!Our 2 guides were great, informative and personable.  They were very proud of Peru and their unique foods.My issue is all we were given to try were the fruits of the market and a papas relleno.  Although we enjoyed all the new and exotic fruits we tried we were promised we were going to try other street foods as we discussed in the planning phase. We didn‚Äôt eat much at breakfast because we were told we would be full with all the things we‚Äôd get to try.  We were even asked if there were any food allergies on our release form.We paid $70 for a 3 hour tour which included walking around Barranco district which was a highlight!  The street art, Bridge of Sighs and coastline views of Lima were gorgeous.  And our brief tuk tuk ride to get to the market was fun.  The tour was good but I feel we should have just joined one of their regular food tours and get to try more foods and pay less than a private tour.

title: Great experience
text: The tour was a great experience, we got to taste a lot of different things typical for Peru. And the guide was very enthousiast in explaining all about it.

title: If you love food, this is a must!
text: We had the most wonderful tour with Arturo! After 3 wonderful hours we left with full bellies, well informed about the history of Peru and amazed by the food we tasted.If you love food, this is the tour for you, loved every minute of it, thank you Arturo!!

title: Wonderful and tasty tour
text: We had a wonderful tour with our fun guide Arturo and Natalia as his side chick & photographer :) We discovered lots of local foods, with many tastings and we visited nice places. Definitly worth it! Thanks a lot!!!

title: Amazing
text: Arturo succesfully shared his true passion for Peruvian food with us. You‚Äôll go home with a lot of knew knowledge and a very full stomach :)

title: Mundero loves Tasty!
text: Thank you so much, Arturo & Natalia! It was an amazing afternoon. Not only a ‚ÄúTasty‚Äù experience but we also learned a lot about Lima/Peru. We had the best time!

title: Foodies Lima
text: We were served some typical peruvian food during the foodies tour. It was nice to trie these things for the first time. Our guide Arturo was also very friendly and gave interesting information.

title: Tasty, funny, informative, everything you need!
text: This tour was our highlight in Lima! Our guide Arturo knows all about food, Lima and Peru in general. We really enjoyed all the different fruits and tasted, a lot of things we had never heard about!Would 100% recommend to take this tour when you have half a day in Lima. Also the barranco neighbourhood was really nice to discover!Thank you for taking our group on this discovery!

title: Foodie tour
text: Very nice experience and beautiful places visited very good food lots of variety and nice guide the local markets were a nice extra

title: Mundero team at peru
text: A lovely tour with a lovley guide to get to know lima and the food of peru. A lot of food, drinks and vieuws to see and experience.

title: Amazing food experience
text: Fantastic tour inside Peruvian food culture. The guide Lucas was just amazing: he was full of information about both Peruvian history and the Peruvian food culture. I really recommend this experience for a deep step into the mixology of Peruvian food, its recipes and the variety of local ingredients. Thank you Lucas for the great time spent together.

title: Lima Local Markets tour.
text: My daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed the three small local markets, and Any was full of information. Loved the fruit tasting and our seafood market lunch.We would not have been able to find these markets or appreciate them on our own.

title: All the food was delicious!
text: Johnny is a fantastic tour guide and I really loved the personal feel of this tour. I learnt so much from him and loved the places we visited - a local fish market, two food markets and the stunning Larco museum. As a non Spanish speaker it gave me deep insight into the history, geography and other aspects of Peruvian culture I wouldn't have had otherwise and for such a good price. Highly recommended!!!

title: A must in Lima for foodies!
text: My sister & I just had a wonderful experiences by visiting the 'mercados' in Lima. Our guide and driver were very kind.First we learned about the fishermen activities in Peru, then it was time to munch!Food was sublime and we had complete information about its history.We highly recommend this tour and the guide Lucas.

title: SIT ON THE LEFT ON THE BOAT
text: Awesome experience! The only thing is try to be on the left side of the boat as 90% of the time, thats where there was something to see. I did read other reviews that said that their boat driver we‚Äôre making sure both sides would see the attraction but it was unfortunately not the case for us. The dune buggy was awesome. I definitely recommend to rush to the buggys to be in the front seat!Bus was clean and comfortable and we we‚Äôre able to leave our bags inside when doing activities.

title: Huacachina, Ballestas Islands and Ica üí´ IMPERDABLES!!
text: Beautiful walk, an adventure that you can not miss!!! History, rich Pisco and lots of fun in the sea and llas dunes!! Roxana, the guide, very attentive and attentive to all needs. ü§óIn short, a worthwhile tour. üòÉ

title: Beautiful experience
text: Fantastic adventure, a full day of unforgettable experiences, thanks to Roxana that facilitated all activities, highly recommended if you like nature and / or adrenaline, recommended for everyone.

title: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
text: The tour was amazing, it was my first trip alone with my daughter and it really was a wonderful experience that we will always remember. Everything was very well organized, with a varied and entertaining route that allowed us to enjoy every moment.Our guide, Maria Ochoa was simply exceptional: attentive, close and always willing to help us. He took care of every detail and shared very interesting information that greatly enriched the experience.I definitely recommend taking the tour with them; dedication, professionalism and warmth are noticeable every step of the way. An experience really worth living.I recommend: take warm clothes to Islas Ballestas as it is windy and light clothes to Huacachina because it is very hot.A loving greeting from Chile üá®üá±

title: 5-start tour
text: Oh, this is a 5-star tour! Oswaldo is simply the best‚Äîgive him a promotion üòÖ. I felt like a VIP with his service. He‚Äôs very attentive and you can tell he truly loves history; he explained the tour so well. He even brought little details like tissue papers, candies, hand sanitizer, and wipes in his backpack. He gave us great tips about the bandanas and the fair prices at the market so we wouldn‚Äôt get scammed. He has the best energy to keep you going through such a long day. Extra points for his music box!The breakfast stop was delicious and warm. It‚Äôs a long day, but at night they even made a stop for bathroom and snacks. Everything was very well organized‚Äîpeople were waiting for us at each spot, and by the end of the night he drops you right back at your pickup location.

title: Great trip. Couldn't understand the guide.
text: Great trip. Ballestas islands not possible so went to other islands instead. Lovely boat and saw lots of wildlife. Pisco tasting was very good. Highlight was the sand buggy tour which was absolutely fantastic. Amazing landscape and incredible drivers. Awesome experience! Unfortunately we could not understand our tour guide Joal. He spoke Spanish and very good English but spoke so quickly and constantly switched between languages so was totally incomprehensible. Not helped by using a poor microphone. But also gave tons of information...but in a monotone all in one go instead of relevant info as we travelled along ..so don't think anyone on the bus, Spanish or English understood anything. Otherwise a great tour.

title: Superb Tour
text: The tour was super nice and economical , we were able to do many things in one tour . A great experience . Dune buggy and sand boarding was a great experience . Also Joal was awesome in the process

title: Wonderful and super pleased with this tour
text: Thank you for giving me such a wonderful experience the super-retail guide, the super responsible driver behind the wheel. Very good logistics. The best part of the whole day was the closure in the sands where I could have an adrenaline spike laughing and feeling like a child

title: Thrilling dune buggy and sandboarding trip with excellent views of marine life.
text: We had an excellent time . The boat ride was amazing and we were able to see all the listed animals. The boat operator was able to get us very close which was awesome .  The wine tour was fun and the guides there have a good time getting the guests to participate. The dune buggy ride was thrilling. Great time sandboarding too. Our guide was very knowledgeable and friendly. The only drawback was it was difficult to understand what he was saying as he has his mouth too close to the microphone. Our only complaint would be that we were left waiting to hear what time the tour bus was going to pick us up. They initially said we would be notified in the late afternoon. This turned into almost 8pm. We wanted to go to bed early to get good rest so that was inconvenient.

title: Don't miss the dunes
text: A very good tour, my favorite part was the dunes in Huacachina, an unforgettable experience watching the sunset. Jordan's always very vigilant about the group.

title: Peru Hop
text: We loved our experience with peru hop! Especially our guide Jose Carlos üíô he is so welcoming and knowledgeable. The dune buggy‚Äôs and sand boarding are a must do! Huacachina is beautiful and the food at Banana‚Äôs is awesome. Peru hop is an easy way to see Peru and meet people. We hope to be back again soon!

title: Great experience, won‚Äôt be let down
text: Peru Hop was a great experience. Everything was easily explained so you could understand what the next few days were going to look like. JC was an amazing tour guide and we enjoyed our additional little things like the pisco class and karaoke with him. The bus had a lot of people, about 45, but the group never felt too big. My bf and I made new friends and had a great time blending with people from all over the world. Peru is gorgeous and as JC said, much more than just Machu Picchu. I‚Äôm so glad we had the chance to explore Paracas and Huacachina with PH!

title: Great experience!
text: Really enjoyed this first part of my Peru hop bus tour! The pickup service is great and easy. My host Ra√∫l was very kind and shared a lot of information about Peru. He helped you with planning your schedule and made sure everybody had lots of fun! Would definitly recommend!

title: Highly recommend
text: Really recommend using PeruHop. Super easy and comfortable buses with Starlink WiFi. It‚Äôs more than just a coach, you get loads of experiences included (which you wouldn‚Äôt do otherwise). Our guide, Luis, was brilliant! Super enthusiastic and proud about his country.

title: Great trip, we‚Äôll organised and super helpful guide Juancho
text: Great trip with Juancho - super friendly and very knowledgeable, he worked hard to make sure everyone had a great time. We really enjoyed our journey

title: Amazing
text: The tour was fantastic, thanks for the organized and personal experience we got to see a lot of Per√∫ with no stress and got to learn a lot from JuanJo he was one of the best I got to experience

title: Great Trip
text: Juancho was great was knowledgeable super nice and made our trip amazing. He went above and beyond to make our trip fun. Overall great trip

title: The best way to travel Peru
text: PeruHop was an excellent way of seeing the stops we wanted to get to. They made everything so easy and the tour guides were fantastic.

title: Fantastic!
text: PeruHop was a great choice for us and Raul was such a brilliant guide! It was so handy and took all of the thinking and stress from the trip. The buses are comfy and we met some great people!

title: Must do! Hassle free way to see Peru
text: Our hop host Raul was amazing! He created a WhatsApp group to keep us all informed and shared tips along the tour. His energy and friendliness was contagious. Thank you for making our Peru trip so memorable

title: Best tour in Peru
text: Everything was well organized and well put together. Bus was nice also. The best part of the trip was the guide Jose Carlos. He made every activity that much better. Extremely nice, helpful, and funny. Wouldn‚Äôt have enjoyed the trip nearly as much as I did if I had a different guide.

title: Thank you
text: Thanks Miguel and Moni for the pleasant experience and positive vibe. Especially passing in to the Bolivia border, it was seamless

title: Thanks, Alvaro!
text: Alvaro is our guide on the Huacachina/Lima return bus trip. Thorough, professional, caring and helpful, and very warm, it is a great pleasure to have him as our guide. Muchas gracias, Alvaro!

title: Easiest 5 stars of my life
text: This was the most seamless, effortless and fantastic trip I have ever done. The company runs like clockwork and they are always ready to answer questions on WhatsApp. The bus itself is almost too good to be true, with perfect WiFi and lots of leg room.I was super lucky to have Raul as our guide who ensured it was an amazing trip. The highlight was the sunset on top of Huacachina, where we toasted with Pisco after an amazing few days. I can‚Äôt recommend Peru Hop enough.

title: Amazing 3 days trip (feat. Miguel)
text: The tour was amazing. We had so much fun. Everything is well organised and the communication is very clear. You will always be given enough time to enjoy the attactions. My personal highlight was the tourguide. His name is Miguel. He is literally born to be a tourguide. He is the best. He has so much fun at work and transmits his joy onto the entire group. He absolutly deserves a raise.So as a sumup I can only recommend booking with PeruHop and hope you get Miguel as your guide.

title: On time and kept you well informed.
text: On time, reliable, keep to well informed, you can either take part in the Peru Hop trips or like us do your own thing.  The buses were comfortable considering the long distances we covered.  Hotel pick ups and drop off were welcome!  We felt that Peru Hop lived up to their website claims and was fair value.

title: Go with Miguel!!
text: Miguel is the BEST tour guide EVER!!  I have traveled a lot over the past 40 Years and Miguel was the absolute best !!!  Tour was super well organized and efficiently run.  Miguel was personable and professional and made such an effort to make sure we were all having a good time!

title: Warm hospitality
text: I‚Äôm a French traveler living in Chile, and I took advantage of a long weekend in September 2025 to fulfill a dream: visiting the legendary Nasca Lines. I chose the 3-day Peru Hop program (Paracas, Huacachina and Nasca) and I can only say: I L O V E D it.The organization was flawless, and the buses always departed on time ‚Äì which is quite amazing considering the number of groups crisscrossing at each destination. The guides were professional, friendly, and truly made the experience enjoyable.A very special mention to Elmer, my host for the 3 days. His passion, enthusiasm, and deep love for his country were truly inspiring. I could hardly believe it when he told us this was only the second group he had ever guided. He did such an outstanding job that it felt like he had been doing this for years.An unforgettable experience, full of discoveries and emotions. I highly recommend Peru Hop to anyone wanting to explore Peru in a unique and well-organized way.

title: Amazing Tour operator in Peru
text: Amazing tour operator in Peru. I didn't know about Peru Hop, I only knew I wanted to do the Nazca Lines flight when I went to Lima and luckily for me Peru Hop came up on my search and I opted for them.From start to finish the 3 days tour was outstanding. The guides were superb, Juan Carlos, Nilka and  Angela couldn't have done enough for you, funny, energetic and knowledgeable.Now I know about Peru Hop I will be with them again on my next trip to Peru.5 stars guys, thanks for the laughs and memories.

title: Good experience
text: Everything was well organized. Nilo gave us a lot of information about the places we visited. But sometimes he could talk less and not repeat everything 5 times ;-)

title: A wonderful experience of a lifetime
text: It was an amazing experience something that will always remain in our memories. Our tour guide Deborah was the very thoughtful and meticulous, explaining everything in great detail even going beyond explaining good food entertainment and everything about each place. We were very lucky and happy to have Deborah as our tour guide.She made a great effort to enlighten everyone about the importance of all the sites we visited and answered all queries to the best of her knowledge. Would love to use her expertise for future trips to Peru .Muchos Gratious Deborah

title: Highly recommend!
text: Alvaro was an amazing guide! He was very clear, explained everything, was friendly, and patient with us. He was very communicative and we had an awesome tour! We saw penguins and sea lions - it was amazing. I highly recommend this experience and Alvaro as a guide.

title: We have been in Peru for five days and it has been spectacular.
text: Lui's kindness made the trip very pleasant. In addition, the conditions were great to carry out our activities.

title: Great surprise!!
text: Very well organized tour, made contact all the time. The guide Juancho was very friendly and kind. My friend and I met people from other countries and that was pretty cool. We recommend!

title: Best way to experience the real Peru
text: We had a great time with amazing activities (the golden shadows trek is highly recommended as is the Islas Ballestas and the sandboarding in huacachina). Miguel was the best guide we ever had on our numerous trips around the world - very well informed, literally a sunshine and always by your side. We felt safe the whole time and lots of fun.

title: Excellent tour
text: Very good experience in general, only in paracas enters a lot of water towards crossbow islands carry a raincoat if you go all the way back

title: Excellent ---Kudos to Raul, our drivers & Peru Hop!!!
text: My husband & I are first-timers in Peru and we are enthralled & captivated! On top of the series of amazing places in Paracas & Huacachina & people we met, are our excellent guide RAUL & our drivers that made our experience to a different level! Raul is very knowledgeable & did an excellent job getting events organized, keeping everyone in the loop of clear & necessary informations about the next stop/tour verbally & thru Whatsapp. He's also very patient & accomodating to new people in our group & addressing our questions or concerns. He connects to his group, stays close by & knows our names. He makes sure everyone in the group is OK.Our group had a lot of fun during our golden shadow trek, we were all mesmerized with the Paracas peninsula, the sunset is beautiful!--it was all worth it (we almost didn't book this one, we're glad we did!) Our guide during the trek is Mickey, he's a lot of fun & very knowledgeable. Our driver in dune baggy who also instructed /assisted us in sand boarding in Huacachina is the best!  ( We regret we only booked a short trip, we'll book a longer trip with Peru Hop when we come back with our kids :-)Angela took over a part of our group boarding bak to Lima at the end of the 2nd day-- Raul made sure everyone is boarded in the bus. We noted good coordination & support among guides which made us even more confident with Peru Hop.Kudos to Raul, our drivers & Angela for always going above & beyond of what they do! More power to Peru Hop!Peru Hop is a MUST if you want an organized, safe & reliable tour  at reasonable price! --- just board the bus (they pick you up from your hotel/drop you off to your hotel), have an excellent guide & enjoy all tours with the group!Thank you soooooo much!!!!

title: Paracas and Huacachina
text: The trip from Lima to Paracas and Huacachina with Peru Hop was simply amazing! From the very beginning everything was well organized and the guide Elmer had such a positive energy, was fun and made sure everyone felt comfortable throughout the journey. So thank you so much!!Paracas was beautiful, and the boat tour to the Ballestas Islands was great. For me Huacachina was the real highlight ‚Äì the desert oasis is breathtaking, and the dune buggy & sandboarding experience was pure adrenaline and so much fun! I decided spontaneously to stay a day longer in Huacachina and it was very easy to organize it with Pery Hop - it was perfect!Highly recommended for anyone who wants to see a lot and get to know to great people!The trip from Lima to Paracas and Huacachina with Peru Hop was just amazing! From the very beginning everything was very well organized and the guide Elmer had a lot of positive energy, good humor and always made sure that we all felt comfortable throughout the trip. Then thank you very much!!Paracas was beautiful, and the boat tour to the Ballestas Islands was beautiful. For my Huacachina it was the best ‚Äì the oasis in the middle of the desert is breathtaking, and the sandboarding buggy experience was pure adrenaline and fun. I spontaneously decided to stay another day in Huacachina and it was very easy to organize it with Peru Hop - it was perfect!I totally recommend it to anyone who wants to see a lot and wants to meet excellent people!

title: Excellent
text: Angie was our guide, she was always on topEarring from us. He explained everything in time and form.It was a great experience, I recommend the Service they offer.

title: Great trip, well managed
text: Lizbeth was a great host. Very friendly and on top of all the details. Really enjoyed the trip and fascinating stops along the way

title: Amazing two day one night tour : an escape from Lima de grio
text: Sergio is a really good tour guide he always try to take care of everyone‚Äôs needs and give us the best experience ever in Peru. The itinerary is fruitful but not too packed. You always get a 15-20 minutes break to charge the phone or to simply rest before another bus ride. The bus is very comfy and the length of the visit is also reasonable. Sergio encouraged me a lot when playing the sand board since I don‚Äôt know how to. He is really patient and gentle.

title: Fun, informative, great when short on time
text: Had a great time. Juancho is an awesome guide. Lots of information shared on Peru. Jam packed itinerary with loads of tour options.

title: Two relaxing days
text: The places we visited were interesting‚Äînone was a stunning must-see, but we spent two relaxing days. The optional lunch in Paracas was mediocre and definitely not good value for money. The guides were competent and lifted our spirits. Special thanks to one of our guides, Alvaro‚Äîhe saved the five-star rating.

title: Perfect two days!
text: Really good organised trip. We had an amazing time at the Paracas national reserve and saw many sealions. The dune buggy‚Äôs and sandboarding was an amazing experience and we saw the sunset from the top of the dunes. The pisco vineyard tour was really fun as well! We had three different tour guides: Aymetj, Lois and Alvaro. They were all really sweet and can help you with any question!

title: Excellent
text: Excellent attention from Lu√≠! We loved my girlfriend and I, great experience if you are in Peru and like to explore and be adventurous

title: Very positive and recommend
text: The trip was very good and very organized. They took care of everything except sleeping arrangements, John Carlos was our guide and he was excellent

title: Tour Guide Jose Carlos was the best!!
text: Amazing tour specially thanks to Jose Carlos, our tour guide, who was really interesting and funny. He was giving us many facts and was helpful any time of the trip, thank you again!Antoine & Plamy

title: Very good experience!
text: Very good experience, my favorite part was huacachina, activities in the sunset, very fun! Ballestas Islands was also interesting, a little dizzy with the boat. My guides Alvaro and Juancho were very attentive and friendly with me, made me feel comfortable and calm. Shuttle Service to the hotel and all activities was key for me as when traveling alone I valued my safety when choosing the tour.

title: Two day tour from Lima, paracas boat tour, dune buggies, sand boarding and pisco vineyard tour
text: Angela was a great guide for the 2 day tour. Always willing to help, easy to understand, punctual and friendly. During the trip we saw plenty of wildlife on the Paracas boat tour. Sampled some delicious Pisco at the vineyard tour, enjoyed the dune buggies and sandboarding on the dunes.

title: Maverick number one! The best tour and guide you can find üëå
text: Beautiful day spent in Lima with our super guide Maverick. Our first day has been perfect thank to him! A complete, safe, interesting and tasty experience that I suggest to everybody.Greetings from ItalyAlexandra ü§©

Great tour! Far beyond our expectations.Silvana, our guide, was very lively and enthusiastic, she replied to all our questions giving extra details. She made our fist day in Peru special. A very good way to start.Also our driver, Moreno, was really nice, car super clean and he droved carefully.

title: Amazing Tour of Lima!
text: JJ is a great tour guide know what hes talking about due to his passion and pove to share what he knows about Lima, Miraflores and Barranco! Thanks for the tour, as well as the churros and ice cream!

title: Great highlight tour of Lima
text: This was a very nice highlight tour of the city of Peru. We visited neighborhoods , parks, markets, church, and catacombs and great eats . Very clear historical background . Paola and Gaby were really professional and knowledgeable. Thank you for the great tour. Highly recommend

title: Very enjoyable and informative tour with Mauricio
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our half day with Mauricio who was very engaging and informative. The highlight was Churillos with it marvellous views back across the city and learning about the war of the Pacific. We thoroughly recommend this as a way to spend half a day learning about this fascinating and varied city.

title: A great tour with a brilliant guide
text: We took this tour as part of a private group shore-excursion when in Callao port, our ship shuttling us to Plaza Santa Rosa, Chucuito where we were met by our guide JJ, his assistant and the driver Julio.  The original excursion group of about 20 was split into two, becoming two small parallel tours, and the communication from Haku's office organising this had been excellent.JJ is one of the best guides I have ever experienced.  He kept us amused with wit and charm, as well as describing the journey from the port to the areas we were visiting.  Throughout the tour he engaged us with information and stories.  He is a credit to Haku and to Peru.Unlike most tours, Haku take you away from the beaten tourist-track, and we started our locations with a visit to the beach and pier at Chorrillos where we experienced the local atmosphere.  It was then on to the local streets in the same neighbourhood, where JJ told us about the local fruit and vegetables and took us through a street market.From there, we were driven to a viewpoint above Chorrillos where we could see the wider Lima city and found out about some of the history.Our next stop was in Barranco, where we were given a little free time to wander around, visit the murals and walk down to a viewpoint overlooking the sea.The final stop before returning us to our starting point was Miraflores and the Parque del Amor.

title: Touring four beautiful neighborhoods of Lima
text: I was fortunate to do this tour with my able guide Aaron, who was knowledgeable, friendly and jolly. I was promptly picked up from my hotel in Miraflores. We did a walking tour of a park in Miraflores then walked towards the coastal road. We had coffee while admiring the stunning view of the coast. Then by car we drove to Chorrillos. We did a quick stop at a restaurant for its equally stunning view of the ocean. After this we proceeded to Barranco, an artsy neighborhood that I absolutely loved. I even got to cross the Bridge of Sigh while holding my breath in the hope that my wish would come true. Lastly we drove to a market in Surquillo, where I got to sample some of Lima‚Äôs tastiest fruits. Afterwards, I was dropped off in my hotel. I immensely enjoyed this tour and would highly recommend it, especially to first time visitors with limited time in Lima.

title: Highlights of Lima: Miraflores, Surquillo, Barranco & Chorrillos
text: Mabel was a wonderful, knowledgable tour guide! We really enjoyed Miraflores, Barranco and Chorillos!

title: A different tour of Lima
text: Cesar and Julio were spectacular. Beautiful and different places with beautiful data and very good energy. 100% recommended.

title: Amazing - definitely recommend!
text: Staff were brilliant. I had Amadeo as a tour guide and Juan as a driver. I also had a message earlier in the day confirming my pick up and a very welcoming conversation.Tour was fab: car was comfortable, there was only 2 of us so it was really exclusive, Amadeo took us to a local market and treated us to fruits, chicha and picarones, his knowledge and English was excellent and he very graciously answered all my questions. We saw non touristy parts of Lima that aren't offered on other tours but felt safe all the time.Having travelled a lot and done various tours, I can't recommend Haki enough, I wish I had more time so I could do more tours with them! And it's all for a great cause too, with profits going to help extremely impoverished communities.

title: Colonial ambiance, great show and wonderful food!!
text: Our party of 5 adults had an amazing time at Casa Tambo. The show was so lively and entertaining, and we loved every minute of it. The restaurant itself is truly lovely. The decoration throughout the place took us aback time. Food, don‚Äôt get me started!!! Truly amazing, and the staff was very courteous and attentive. Overall, 100% recommend!! Word to the wise, make sure you leave well ahead of time for the 7:30pm show. You will be hitting their peak at rush hour and you could miss your reservation as the restaurant will allow a 10 minute grace period.

title: Swimming with Sea Lions
text: Awesome visit with the sea lions and some humble penguin..:) our tour guide Rodrigo was awesome ‚Ä¶:) wet suit recommended because of the cold weather ..!!

title: Pre-Columbian art.
text: As always it is a luxury to return is special to this truly impressed luxury tour with its large collection of paintings and various pre-Columbian ceramics.

title: I didn't think it would end like this. Very good,
text: It was quite an experience, very didactic and entertaining. Carlos was very friendly and aroused a lot of our curiosity by telling us details about each of the paintings.

title: Family trip to MALI
text: Excellent museum. Arrive early so you don‚Äôt miss anything and have plenty of time to explore. Entrance ticket can be paid with credit card. Go ahead and pay extra for the museum guide! Christian was incredibly knowledgeable about the history of Peru, the museum artifacts, the more modern art, and even behind the scenes stories and examples. We ran out of town because of our own poor timing but we could have listened to him all day. An excellent museum and guided experience!

title: Incredible?
text: All perfect! The tour was very educational and the guide Carlos was very friendly and knows everything. I recommend it to all Peruvians and foreigners 100%.

title: Mali Night
text: I really enjoyed MALI NIGHT, good music, a super calm atmosphere for an after office, very well organized! I recommend it!

title: Luxury guided tour!
text: The experience was beautiful. Taking advantage of the Incas exhibition (totally recommended and important), we were lucky enough to be invited to Alonso Cueto to talk with the curator Ricardo Kusunoki, about some of the works on display, delving deeper into the context that existed at that time in our history. , and making it very entertaining. Ricardo is a boss.

title: Excellent and very entertaining experience
text: Excellent experience! Worth the time to hear what the very knowledgeable curator had to say about some of the paintings. You gain a different prospective after hearing the story behind the paintings. I highly recommend it. You also get a little lesson in Peruvian history.

title: Tremendous show, tremendous conversation!
text: A nice visit to the museum! The exhibition The Incas, beyond an empire is great. And if that were not enough, we were lucky enough to listen to a delicious conversation between the curators of the exhibition and Alonso Cueto about his new book Francisca.

title: Excellent experience and thorough extensive collection
text: Ana was amazing, answered all of my questions and gave such detailed information about all of the artwork and sculptures! She is very passionate and excited about her work. Highly recommend

title: A ‚Äúto do‚Äù in Lima
text: Very knowledgeable curator. Gorgeous museum. Carefully preserved tapestries over 2000 years old. Lovely cafe. Well worth visit. Need to go more than once.

title: It was ok
text: I wish that I was aware of the fact that no one else booked this trip on that date. It was just me for many hours with a driver the didn‚Äôt speak English. My trip consisted of gas station food and some bathroom breaks. The translator was only used for booking the 30 minute flight which google translate would have done the job. The driver was nice but for the money I paid it didn‚Äôt add up.

title: southern adventures - 100% recommended! a unique experience!
text: an excellent and professional agency! Everyone on the team was very friendly and the treatment was very good, professional and reliable! We have felt very good! 100% recommended!

title: Excellent was to see Lima!
text: The driver was on time, courteous, and was a safe driver. The vehicle was a new SUV, and was very clean and comfortable. Our driver, Alessandro, was outstanding. He reviewed our itinerary, gave us helpful advice, and got us to our destinations with ease. Definitely would use again.

title: Peruvian Flavors Tour
text: Arturo is an excellent guide!!! He took us to a local non-tourist market. I tried everything!! Rare fruits, snacks, meals, soups and desserts.The good thing is they don't want to sell you anything!!! It's just testing. Super remondable. Go fast!!!!

title: Awesome Experience - Don't miss it!
text: Do not hesitate to book this fantastic tour.  Our expectations were exceeded in every manner.  Arturo, our guide was excepitional.  He was awesome.  He had a passion for his city.  We enjoyed eating at a local restaurant.  Arturo explained everyone of the numerous local dishes.  The food and service was exceptional.  There was a large amount of food.  The four of us were very pleased.  We not only had a great experience but gained a friend.  Incredible tour!!

title: Explore the coastline, picturesque neighborhood + 4 course lunch and desserts!
text: Excellent afternoon eating and sightseeing with Arturo. Loved exploring the coastline! We took the TukTuk tour; ate a full 4 course lunch followed by several desserts a few hours later. All the food was incredible! They were able to accommodate my mother‚Äôs food restrictions as well (no salt). The walk around Barranco was easy and educational. Such a picturesque neighborhood! Highly recommend.

title: Great experience on a local food market with a very nice and knowledgeable tour guide! Highly recommended!
text: It was such a great food tour with Arturo as we experienced the variety of the Peruvian food on a local market in Barranco. He was showing us many dishes from starters, to drinks, fruits, sweets etc. It was really delicious and interesting as Arturo has a great knowledge of the Peruvian food and of the history of his country. He is a nice and funny guy. I really recommend this tour!

title: The best way to learn about Peru's gastronomy history by tasting some of it!
text: Our group of 6 joined Arturo our guide and embarked into this wonderful all inclusive food experience tour. We rode on a local bus into another section of town to meet our assigned Tuk Tuk's, where we then started our tour to learn about and taste some of Peru's best down to earth, fresh and local food offers. Arturo accommodated our party needs into his tour, ensuring that we had a pace to fit the group's fitness limitations and food preferences which allowed for a superbly relaxed and enjoyable tour. His selection of stops where he explained in depth about Peru's geographical regions, culture and history, and how they shaped the way Peruvians eat, followed by a lunch stop with a fantastic array of local tasty dishes made for a great culinary and tasty adventure. To close the tour, he walked us thru several areas of town which included some beautiful historic tourist areas, a produce market and then ended with a fantastic tasting of Peruvian chocolate deserts and drinks. This tour went above and beyond our expectations and made for the best experience in Lima during our trip. We highly recommend this tour and Arturo for those visitors who want to learn about Peruvian local dished and history,

title: Unique Experience and Great Food
text: This was a really fun tour that truly gave you an experience that you could not replicate on your own. Riding the public bus was interesting, the Tuk Tuk was really fun and we ate at a restaurant for lunch that was truly full of locals. The food was incredible and Sheyla was a fun and knowledgeable guide. Great tour!

title: Great experience!
text: What a great tour! Arturo shared a lot of interesting information both about food and Peru, we really appreciated his expertise. Lunch was at a restaurant we never would have found on our own, the dishes were delicious and plentiful. The bus and the tuk tuk were both a fun adventure. I can't recommend this tour enough.

title: Excellent way to get to know Peru
text: Our guide Arturo did an amazing job helping us to understand the Peruvian way of dining.  The boys enjoyed touring around in the Tuk Tuks and seeing parts of Lima we hadn't discovered yet.  Arturo took us for lunch at a local spot that wasn't a tourist spot to enjoy an authentic Peruvian meal.  On top of teaching us about dining in Lima he also offered advice for when we moved on to Cusco and the higher altitudes there.  Was a great way to start off our Peruvian adventure and helped make the rest of the trip better by knowing where to go and what to eat.

title: Absolute blast
text: This was our first time in Lima, and being from South America we already knew peruvian food, but we felt it'd be a good start for our trip if we took an introductory tour.Didn't really know exactly what to expect when it came to the tour itself, but we were more than pleased with the whole experience.Arturo (our guide) was very punctual, and an absolute delight to tour with. He spoke portuguese very well and language was far from being a barrier to us. He was not only a great tour guide, with a lot of information and insights, but also an overall great company, and very nice guy to have around.The tour itself was super fun and a very comprehensive take on Lima and Peru. The tuk-tuk is an every-day mean of transportation for the people in Lima, and it felt like a very authentic experience to roll around through Chorrillos in one.The food was amazing, the restaurant we were taken to - again - felt very authentic and we could see absolutely no tourists around. We had causa, ceviche and a serve of makis covered in rocoto that were to die for. All of that accompanied by a jar of very nice (the best we had in Lima) Chicha Morada.I tried very hard to think of any criticism or improvement points, but failed to do so. This is a must do while in Lima.Helpful tips: the meal was very generous, so have a light breakfast on the day of the tour.Remember to bring water so you don't have to stop to get it, the tour is long.Bring some money for tips, there's a chance you'll find the Fraile taking his leap, and that guys deserves some money.Be generous when tiping! It's a hell of a work done by the tour guides, they deserve it!

title: Perfect day in Lima
text: Arturo was the perfect guide!!!  His English is outstanding.  He was very informative and very helpful. The lunch was a 10.  Would highly recommend him to all.  Thanks Arturo for a great memory

title: A beautiful place just north of Lima
text: Carlos is a terrific guide, knowledgeable,  pleasant, reliable. The lomas are amazing locations for folks who love plants and animals. The landscape there is beautiful. The hike has some steep hills but Carlos is willing to go slow as needed. Highly recommend this day trip.

title: 10/10‚Äîwould do it again (during the winter season)!
text: I had such a great time with Carlos that I tried to stay another day to go on another tour with him!

title: Great daytrip from Lima, highly recommended!
text: I can highly recommend going on the Lomas de Lachay tour with Los Cazadunas. The Lomas were beautiful when me and my girlfriend went in October. We saw a lot of wildlife ranging from different birds, insect and reptiles. It was just the two of us on the tour together with our kind and funny guide Carlos. He was very knowledgeable about the area but also peruvian nature in general. Overall a great experience that i would recommend to anyone looking for an interesting daytrip from Lima.

title: Highly recommend this Lomas de Lachay hike
text: This was such a good booking! Highly recommend this excursion. Me and my brother did this trip in winter time so the Lomas were full of flora because of the fog. We learned a lot and got some really great pictures and views on the hike. It was a long but not difficult hike which was worth the time. Our guide got us breakfast, let us find some rocks to go bouldering and was very accommodating to make our trip awesome.

title: Excellent will use this agency again!
text: I am beyond thrilled. Bryan made sure all of needs were met and made sure to notify me of delays and problems. I know I was one of few tourists whose English (or anything besides Spanish and Portuguese) was my primary language. However, I felt well taken care of.

title: Wonderful trip!
text: The travel was wonderful. The agency is really very good! Everything was super organized, we didn‚Äôt have any problems with our logistics, everything worked perfectly! They were very efficient and attentive.

title: A Must Do Tour for First Time Visitors to Lima
text: This tour is an absolute must for anyone visiting Lima for the first time. Whenever I travel to a new city, I make it a point to start with an introductory tour like this to get my bearings and understand the layout of the neighborhoods and local communities. This experience fulfilled that purpose perfectly but what made it stand out was our guide Felipe Admittedly I was initially unsure about Felipe due to his youthful appearance. I wondered how much insight he could offer. I couldn't have been more mistaken. Felipe was not only incredibly knowledgeable about Lima's history and cultural landscape but also highly attentive to our group's needs. My family and I truly appreciated his depth of knowledge and engaging style After the tour we invited Felipe to join us for dinner. He gladly accepted and even recommended several great restaurants in the area. Once we made our choice he shared the backstory of the restaurant we selected its origins the history of its founder and its evolution over the years. It added such a rich layer to our dining experience Felipe exceeded all expectations and while there's no guarantee every guide will be quite like him this tour remains an essential experience for anyone looking to understand both the highlights and realities of life in Lima. I highly recommend it

title: Best city tour ever
text: High recommended, Felipe is an excellent guide. Very detailed oriented, professional and full of fun. It‚Äôs an amazing tour

title: Excellent tour of the hiistoric cith of Lima
text: We ended up having a private tour. Our guide, Phillipe, was fantastic. His English was execellent and he is very knowledgeable. We enjoyed his stories and seeing the city of Lima thorug his proud eyes.

title: Fun in Historical Lima
text: Felipe was amazing! Our tour was very personalized! We went at our own pace, stopped for snacks, and learned so much about the Peruvian history! We all had a blast!

title: Lima grands
text: Excellent time. Felipe provided so much extra time with us. Very informative and personal experience. I would do it over again. Loved the catacombs and then some churro. Just go and experience

title: Great tour of history and catacombs
text: FILEPE WAS VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE. WE ENJOYED OUR TOUR VERY MUCH. HE TOOK THE TIME TO SHOW US SO MUCH AND EVEN JOINED US FOR LUNCH AT THE END. HIGHY RECOMMEND THIS TOUR OF THE CATACOMBS AND CITY.

title: Peruvian tour
text: Felipe, hands down, was the best tour guide ever. He truly gave me an awesome personalized and flexible experience. It felt like I'd known him for decades. He was knowledgeable and passionate about his work. The historical tour, Sprinkled with a food tour, ended with a night at the water fountain park. Ir was a great day!

title: Best tour in Lima City
text: Cesar was my guide for the walking tour of the kings and catacombs. He was so knowledgeable and kind. It was a great tour 10/10 totally recommend and ask for Cesar!!

title: Amazing tour! You should do it  :)
text: Amazing tour!! Filipe took his time to answer all my questions. I‚Äôve been to many many tours and this has been my best experience by far. :)

title: Perfect introduction to Lima
text: Great tour of the city, would thoroughly recommend it. My tour guide Felipe and driver Jorge were fantastic and very informative.

title: Tour in Lima excellent
text: Thank you very much for the tour that the boys gave us, very organized in everything and I guato visit the historic center of Lima.

title: Excellent tour!
text: It is definitely the best choice to do a Tour, the guys are very capos and very attentive with everything!! Fully recommended for those who do not know this tour, would return again without a doubt!! Thank you so much!!!

title: Impressive
text: Thank you very much for the organization and for the good treatment of the guide Augusto, his professionalism and his vibes of being able to connect the group, also, the best part in my opinion was going to the catacombs and the tasting of piscos that he gave me at the end.

title: Highly recommended !!!!!!
text: It was an excellent Tour!! full of empathy and knowledge on Augusto's part, we toured several places and at the end we enjoyed a tasting of Pisco , it was magical and amazing the moment.

title: EXCELLENT
text: The place is too good, and the guides are very attentive, it is a great experience that you will not forget and I recommend them to all the public.
All very good and guide them the most. Recommended, they explain very well to details and friendliness. Recommended, next time I'll come with my family.

title: Good ride.
text: Give the best lime tour, are attentive and friendly, the places are excellent, you can go alone or accompanied and still enjoy the experience

title: Excellent tour
text: Excellent travel agency , I really liked the tour of the historic center of Lima I took many photos and knew all about lime

title: Wonderful Experience with Lima America Tours
text: Hello,I went on this tour with my tour guide Augusto and it was wonderful. He was extremely knowledgeable about the city and made us feel very comfortable through the entire experience. Thanks to him I felt safe in Lima as he also provided tips on how to navigate the city. Lima is full of rich culture that everyone should explore at least once. I also booked two additional guided tours with him and the experiences were just as exceptional. Thank you Augusto and Lima America Tours.Sharmila

title: Great way to get to know Lima
text: We really enjoyed the tour! We learn a lot about the history of lima and the culture. Our guid augusto was amazing and answeared all of our questions.

title: Joseph was and amazing guide!
text: The food on this trip is great. Beef heart and fruit was very interesting. The chichiron sandwich was great. Visiting the meat (chicken, beef, etc) market was eye opening

title: Excellent experience
text: Excellent route, you know all the center of Lima and super friendly our guide, we knew the park la Muralla, church of San Francisco and Catacombs, Plaza de Armas and Lima Cathedral.

title: Excellent
text: John and I had an excellent tour with Arturo! Our tour also included food tour, chinatown, vendor market. Arturo is knowledgeable, engaging, friendly and overall made the experience a memorable one for is! We highly recommend Arturo!

title: Exciting city tour incl. catacombs
text: Unser Guide Arturo war super. The tour felt like traveling with a friend. He told a lot of exciting information about the historic city center and we were also able to ask a lot of questions. You can really feel how much pleasure he has in his work. I can recommend the tour to anyone who wants to arrive in Lima's center and learn something extra.

title: Arturo was a wonderful guide
text: Arturo was a great tour guide, initially we were confused about the meeting place but once we arrived he was very welcoming and friendly, guiding us through the sites and very informative. Highly recommend Arturo as your guide

title: Citytour lime and catacombs
text: Excellent city tour. Very complete and interesting everything we saw and learned. I especially highlight our guide Yoced, rating that his work does it with great passion and transmits it to others. Highly recommended

title: History of Lima
text: ARTURO, was our guide!! Very friendly, attentive and knowledgeable about the history of lime, made the tour very fun!! Thank you very much for having a fun time.

title: Gastronomy and Lima history with an exceptional guide
text: We did this tour with Gustavo and it was a highly recommended experience. From the beginning he showed interest in our origin and maintained a close treatment. We tasted a variety of typical dishes ‚Äî choclo, stuffed potato, ceviche, dumplings, lucuma smoothie, anticucho, picarones and local fruits ‚Äî while telling us the story and curiosities of each. After the gastronomic part we visited the Plaza de Armas and the Catacombs of San Francisco, an impressive place for its ancient library and the human remains that it houses. The tour was enjoyable and with many opportunities to interact and learn.

title: Nice tour with a surprise treat.
text: Interesting tour and knowledgeable guide. We learned a lot about Lima and its history. There is a surprise treat on the tour.

title: Food tour of Lima
text: Brilliant tour - sights and food. Yoced our guide was lovely. The sights were great. Food we had a good mix of food stalls, market stalls and restaurants. We learnt a lot of history and customs and had a great day. Thanks

title: Fun and fascinating!
text: This was a real fun and fascinating day for us. Chasky Expeditions provide a wonderful experience, and our guide, Ronald and driver, Philipe were amazing. We were picked up early from our hotel and we drove to Pisco for our flight over the Nazca lines. En route we stopped at a most lovely place for breakfast. The flight was an experience! After this we stopped for lunch, a winery tour and then on to the Huacachina Oasis and sand dunes - the most fun part of the day. Sand dune bashing in a buggy and sandboarding were amazing experiences. Ronald was so engaged, attentive and considerate, making this truly one for the best memories!

title: Best way to do Ica and the Nazca Lines
text: We were picked up in a comfortable SUV by our guide Ronald and driver Phillip for the trip to Ica. Ronald was passionate in his knowledge and Phillip passionate in his driving - just what you want in a long trip! All stops were amazing - loved the dune buggy, sandboarding, winery as lunch and the flight over the Nazca lines. Highly recommended!

title: What and incredible tour!
text: My family and I took the ‚ÄúPrivate Tour to the Astonishing Nazca Lines and Huacachina Oasis‚Äù with Chasky Xpedition, and we had such an incredible time!Our tour guide, Felipe, was amazing! He was extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and genuinely invested in making sure we had the best possible experience. On top of that, he spoke perfect English, which made everything smooth.We were even able to customize the tour to our interests ‚Äî instead of visiting Pisco Nietto, we opted for the Paracas National Reserve, which was absolutely worth it. The Huacachina oasis and the dunes in the desert were so much fun. And, of course, the Nazca Lines were AMAZING, a true once-in-a-lifetime sight! This tour was especially convenient because the flight departs from Ica airport, allowing us to skip an unnecessarily extra-long car drive.Thank you so much Felipe!

title: Very interesting experience
text: The trip was very interesting and the guide Ronald very friendly and always attentive to everything we needed Spectacular views and very fun dunes

title: Ronald excellent guide
text: The guide Ronald was extraordinary, very cultured with excellent attitude and kept giving explanations, you can see that he enjoys his work

title: Amazing
text: The tour was incre√≠ble, it was an beautiful experience in Per√∫. Felipe and Wilton were great. We took so many pictures.  Thanks!

title: Great day out
text: We had a great day with our guide Ronald and driver Wilton. The Van was modern, clean and comfortable, and narration through the journey really useful. The flight, winery tour, buggy ride etc were all perfectly coordinated and seamless. Would do it again in a heartbeat (and Ronald knows a little bit about Aussie sports now too!). Highly recommended.

title: Charming and unforgettable
text: Excellent tour! Except it's not cheap, but it's worth it. We were picked up on time at the hotel and we followed silver the first destination, which was the Oasis. The journey is long, but the car was very comfortable and passed up that fast. Although not the biggest attraction of the tour, the Oasis is quite cool and the sandboard and buggy ride are fun. We have lunch at the vineyard and we continue to the flight over the lines of Nasca which are charming. We loved the walk. Special thanks to Guia Ronald and driver Carlos.

title: Highly recommend!!
text: My husband and I highly recommend the private tour to the Nazca lines and Huacachina Oasis with Chasky Xpedition. The team that provided the tour, Felipe, and our driver were exceptional. We were picked up on time and taken from our hotel to the Pisco airport, a several-hour drive in a comfortable SUV. Our driver ensured a very smooth and safe drive. During the drive, Felipe provided helpful background information on the Nazca lines. He is very knowledgeable and can communicate complex concepts in a friendly and understandable manner.When we arrived at the airport, he took us to the museum and continued explaining what we would see while we waited to receive our seat assignments on the plane.The Nazca Lines plane flight was a once-in-a-lifetime experience! Upon our return, we drove to the Huacachina Oasis. The dune buggy company and driver provided exceptional service, making our dune buggy ride thrilling and memorable. We ate a delicious lunch. We also did a private tasting at the beautiful Tabernero winery, and Felipe ensured we tasted high-end sipping piscos. We had an excellent drive back to our hotel.We highly recommend the tour. It‚Äôs more expensive than others because you spend less time (hours) on the road, and the plane flight is more expensive since it‚Äôs from a closer airport to Lima. However, it was well worth it! It is a first-class tour.

title: Maybe go with a more established tour operator
text: Tour company cancelled because they claimed "safety reasons" of the aircraft, but we all know it was because not enough people signed up for the tour. They provided a full refund, but it was a pain in the neck to meet up with them because they wanted to give me cash back instead of refunding to credit card.

title: Amazing experience
text: Our cooking class with Felipe was fantastic. He picked us up on time and then we drove to a local market. Felipe told us so many interesting things about the different fruits, vegetables and spices that you can find at the market. And he not only knows a lot about food, but also about Lima, Cusco and the history of Peru. After the market, we went to the cooking studio and had a great two and a half hours with delicious food, good drinks and nice conversations. We definitely recommend booking a cooking class with Felipe and his colleagues. He is such a nice and cool guy and you certainly won't regret it. It's also a great way to learn more about Peruvian cuisine and, of course, it's simply great fun :)

title: An amazing day!
text: Filipe was an amazing guide through the market. His depth of knowledge was truly impressive. Nindi, our chef, was not only a wonderful cook but conveyed her passion for the local cuisines. They both made us feel welcome and encouraged our questions and participation. I highly recommend this experience and would encourage anyone seeking a local market and cooking tour/experience to seek out Felipe and Nindi specifically. They made the day very special for us.

title: The best market tour and cooking class in Lima!!
text: This tour was outstanding.  We were a bit concerned bc of the lack of reviews but went ahead with booking.   Felipe and Danilo picked us up at our hotel on time and took us to Mercado 1, where Felipe showed us the bounty of fruits, vegetables and meats that are from Peru.  Felipe‚Äôs english is terrific and his pride in his country is infectious.   After the tour we went back to Chef Nindi‚Äôs apartment where we learned how to make a few salsa‚Äôs, ceviche and a stir fry.  The experience was amazing and delicious (we didn‚Äôt eat dinner that night bc there was so much food!).  The apartment is quite close to two artisan markets and not far from Kennedy Square.  The tour includes hotel pickup and drop off but we chose to walk back to our hotel - safe area, nice walk!

title: Fun, energetic and tasty!
text: A great experience!  We had a tour of the local market where Felipe told us about specific fruits and vegetables, how they are prepared and their national value.  He was very attentive to our interests and accommodating of our questions.  Nindy had started the prep work in the kitchen, and she put us to work slicing and preparing.  We dined and laughed together as Nindy shared cooking tips and techniques.  Two young energetic people sharing their love of cooking and Peru.  A wonderful experience!  Would do it again!

title: Traditional Peruvian cuisine cooking clasd
text: I loved all of it! Philipe is so knowledgeable and has a fun sense of humor!  Nindy was amazing! She was thoroughly prepared.  I love to cook!  It was fun to learn to make new foods that tasted amazing I felt like I came away with some new skills!

title: Culinary Experience
text: Amazing culinary experience! Learned a lot about a Peruvian culinary hx and food. Great guide! Recommend him highly! Diversity of the food well presented.

title: Excellent tour in Lima!
text: The tour guide Jhonny knew exactly what he was doing. No time wasted. In a very short time I knew about the history of Lima. If he was my history teacher I could have passed the exams with flying colours. Thank you Jhonny.

title: To recommend excellent!
text: Fantastic experience, very well prepared guides and always excellent! Everything worked perfectly! Highly recommended!

title: Fantastic experience
text: I booked a 10 days tours in Peru with Vipac what I truly enjoyed. The communication was really outstanding from the beginning to the end. The organization was first class. I thought it would be one tour from the beginning to the end,but it was always a different one or two day tours. The guides are always let me know the pickup time at the previous evening, so I had time to prepare and be ready. They were always on time,no issues at all. It was really an unforgettable, "once in a lifetime" tour. The only issue was that I booked an English tour and my first couple of days I was put with Spanish group, where the guide spoke mainly Spanish and just a couple of sentences of English. Most of the time I didn't have a clue what's happening, missed lots of history and information. I felt like an alien, totally left out. I emailed to the company and they solved the issue quickly and efficiently. Thank you for the amazing experience

title: The Peruvian experience we wanted
text: The organization of the Enterprise and the punctuality in the times is surprising, also to highlight the staff that always lived up to it.

title: Experience Peru 10/10
text: Score of 10. Always available, always worried about us. Guides with a lot of experience and passion for historiq. The experience has been unforgettable. Thank you very much VIPAC.

title: Wonderful experience in Per√π with Vipac
text: Everything was really perfect. Companions, drivers and guides are very professional and kind.Only problem that I have was at Cusco Airport with the Latam desk. The girl at the desk was really incompetent and gave me a very bad service. But it does not dipend on Vipac.

title: Memorable!
text: We were pleasantly surprised at our Welcoming both at the airport, hotels, various transfers and that they went smoothly each time.10/10.Macchu Picchu, Vinuncunca and not to mention the other sites were a very nice experience and our expectations exceeded what we really wanted.

title: Review of group trip to Peru
text: Edwin de Arequipa, Franklin and Felipe de Cusco were the best guides we could have!! All of them put the best of the waves, willing to answer all our questions, with great knowledge of the area and always providing other options of activities.Yanet de Puno and Johnny de Machu Pichu were regular guides. In Yanet's case, the group was mainly Spanish-speaking, and did most of the tour in English, without translating parts into Spanish when there were English-speaking group members. Jonny very structured and evasive when answering questions.

title: Would I repeat the trip?
text: Excellent experience, visit of the main touristic and historic sites of Peru. Sadly the visit to Machu Pichu had to be cancelled, but 2 alternative‚Äôs were given. Guides very helpful and nice, but a little repetitive in the information provided. Good communication. Although small groups, a little smaller (till 10) groups would have been more comfortable. For the length of visits made one or two more days would be nice. No time free makes the trip very tiring and prevents us to enjoy a city like Cusco. Would I repeat the trip? Probably yes.

title: Quieter and more organized travel
text: Vipac made our trip possible and more peaceful. We had support all the time and found great professionals during trips between cities. Everyone is congratulated!

title: We were picked up at the airport Daniela and her driver on time.. the next day we were picked up for macchupichu
text: Professionals 110%. Tremendous company and tremendous professionals all. They picked us up at the airport, the next day they picked us up and arranged everything to go to Machupichu with guide Mr. Hector and yesterday they picked us up at hotel and took us back to the airport.Thank you very much

title: Unmissable!
text: It's spectacular. It's like going out for beer with a friend. Beyond beer, which explain them in detail, you can talk about everything. It doesn't feel like a tour with a guide, it teeth like having beers with a friend.

title: Drink craft beer with a great guide!
text: Great way to get to know the Peru craft beer communidad! Our tour guide was amazing. And picked the best beers. Great experience!

title: Great
text: Great tour, highly recommend. This tour was a great time and very informative, if you take it when you arrive you will know where to go for the rest of your trip.

title: Beer tour was amazing
text: Went on this tour with my buddy who was in a wheelchair.Our guide was awesome. Very knowledgeable about the local beers brewed in Lima and surrounding cities and has a great deal of knowledge of the local life. Mira Flores is a beautiful region and the bars were rad. The beer was good and would recommend to any beer lover.

title: Craft Beer Tour in Miraflores
text: Such an incredible experience! I highly recommend Eduardo - he's an amazing host! Had a lot of different craft beers and really enjoyed my experience

title: Amazing beer tour arsenals
text: Incredible arsenal beer tour, we tried more than 10 beers from different places in Peru, we matched with another couple which made the afternoon more fun talking about our cultures with good beers, our guide explained the history of craft beers and how it has grown in these last years, if you want to spend a fun afternoon book this tour

title: Highly recommended tour
text: We did the tour of Peruvian craft beers and we were totally surprised at the good beers that are in Peru, Eduardo told us that it influences a lot the water in the different places, the preparation technique and the inputs to be so good, also that when taking the private tour for us 2 we could know an additional place and taste the winning beer of the world beer.

title: Excellent
text: Excellent Tour to taste very good quality beers in Lima, Eduardo was very attentive and resolved all doubts. I highly recommend taking this tour.

title: Book this tour!
text: Awesome experience with Eduardo! He is very passionate and knowledgeable about the craft beer scene in the country. Patiently explained everything and even had an in depth history of the beer scene dating back to European times. Would definitely recommend.

title: Best Craft Beer Experience in Peru!
text: I really enjoyed this experience! It was great to try craft beers from Peru.  Eduardo, our tour guide, was really knowledgeable.  He educated us on the company and the different types of craft beers.  The hospitality was excellent and I am looking forward to taking more tours with Eduardo the next time I return to Lima, Peru.

title: Jaime's excellent Huacachina experience.
text: Jaime is an excellent guide and Carlos is a great driver who got us to our destinations efficiently and safely.  Jaime provided great commentary on all things Peruvian and non Peruvian.  The Huacachina oasis and dune buggy ride was a blast.  The private option was well worth our while as we were able to skip the Ballestas Islands boat ride in order to have more time to prepare for an early flight the next day.  We were a little disappointed that we were not credited with the cost of the boat ride, but we did not let that detract from an excellent tour.

title: Best Way to Explore Paracas & Huacachina in a Day
text: We recently joined the All Inclusive Day Trip to Paracas & Huacachina Oasis and had a fantastic experience! Everything was very well organized from start to finish. Our driver Henry was safe, professional, and made the long journey comfortable. Our guide Jaime was knowledgeable, friendly, and always made sure we were having a good time. He explained everything clearly and added a personal touch to the experience. The tour itself was an amazing combination of sights ‚Äî from the boat ride in Paracas with its stunning views and wildlife, to the unforgettable adventure in the Huacachina desert oasis. We highly recommend this tour to anyone visiting Lima who wants to explore more of Peru in just one day. Thank you Henry and Jaime for making it such a memorable trip!

title: Fun filled day
text: An unforgettable day with Henry and Jaime!Our private tour was an absolutely incredible experience, from start to finish. We had a fantastic time exploring the sand dunes in a buggy, which was a thrilling way to see the landscape. The wine tasting was a delightful surprise, offering a unique and relaxed break in our adventure. The marine boat tour was equally amazing, giving us a beautiful perspective from the water.A huge part of what made this tour so special was our driver, Henry, and our guide, Jaime. Henry was an exceptionally safe and skilled driver, making us feel completely at ease on the roads. Jaime was the perfect tour guide‚Äîknowledgeable, fun, and attentive to every detail. They both went above and beyond to make sure we had the best day possible.I highly recommend this private tour to anyone looking for a unique and action-packed day. Thank you, Henry and Jaime, for a truly memorable experience!

title: A long day very well spent! One of the best day trips I‚Äôve been on!
text: I had the best time!!!!! Let me start by setting expectations, it is a LONG day! I got picked up at 5:45 AM and I got dropped off at 10:45 PM. So, with that in mind, one of the best day trips I‚Äôve been on EVER! Jaime, our guide and Henry, our driver, took such excellent care of us. Our tiny group of 3 didn‚Äôt wait any lines, everything was organized so smoothly and come hungry!!! There was so much great food and the alcohol was great too!  I saw penguins, sea lions, got splashed by Pacific Ocean water (maybe bring a rain jacket or sit in middle of the boat), got to learn about Peruvian wine and pisco making,  more important, tasted them. Then it was off to the oasis where the dune buggy and the sand boarding awaits! This dune buggy is legit for those adrenaline junkies, we flew a bit and the sand boarding was so fun!!!!! Please please pleas book this, you won‚Äôt regret it!

title: Wonderful day full of adventures!
text: We had a wonderful day with Jaime our guide and Henry our driver. All of Jamie‚Äôs recommendations were spot on! From the traditional pork sandwich for breakfast to lunch options at the Winery. I really enjoyed every aspect of the tour. From seeing penguins to sand boarding, it was a great first day in Peru!

Have a great experience with the Tour. Jaime was our guide for the day and he went above and beyond to make the best day for us. He was kind enough to do the explanations both in English and Spanish so our whole party could understand. We could do tons of activities without feeling cramp. Henry was an amazing driver and make us feel comfortable during the long drives. I recommend it.

title: The best experience in Lima with the best

title: Jaime and Patrick were great as the Dynamic Duo!
text: Our Oasis day trip was an absolute blast! The timing was perfect - not too long, but we managed to squeeze in everything we wanted to do. Jaime provided much history of the region and willingly explained and answered every question with a deep knowledge and insight.Patrick‚Äôs adept driving quickly and expertly got us in and out of Lima without any doubt whatsoever. Patrick also managed the tricky traffic of the region without any issues.The sand buggy and sand surfing were an absolute thrill! Jaime was a lifesaver when we arrived at the restaurant. Jaime took the time and effort to ensure our breakfast order was ready, and the food was delicious and hot. Lunch was just as well prepared and thoughtful. And the time we spent at the Tamara winery was a perfect way to wrap up a great adventure. I highly recommend Jaime and Patrick to escort us on another adventure in the future!

Loved it.
