title: Perfect memory video ‚≠êÔ∏è
text: I had a great time with my friends, the man was super kind and the final result was beautiful. Super recommended.

title: Walk in pairs
text: I had a great time with my husband, young Reyser was very kind to us. 100% recommended for everyone.

title: Walk with my partner
text: Excellent service from Reiser, very friendly at all times, we had a great time with my partner, attentive to everything, I recommend them.

title: Introduction to Peruvian cuisine
text: Great class. Very entertaining and to the point. Great introduction to Peruvian cuisine. If you want to learn about the variety of Peruvian cuisine, how to cook the food and the ingredients this is the way to go. It also provides you with a sample of various plates so you will have a better idea of what to order at a restaurant.

title: Wonderful Experience!
text: What a great way to learn more about Peruvian food and culture. It turned that my wife and I were the only ones in this class and our chef, Rayfel, was excellent! Great dinner and Pisco sour! Highly recommend!

title: Prepare, learn and eat an amazing Peruvian meal
text: This was the best meal we had on our trip!  Rafael was a wonderful host, chef and teacher, teaching us about local foods, cooking methods and how to present beautifully.  There was plenty of food, all fresh ingredients with a tasty pisco sour!  Great activity for families and friends.

title: Sensational sours and Saltado
text: Amazing food with Rafael. He clearly explained the background and preparation for each dish, now I‚Äôm going to go home and try to make some of these for my family üòÅ. P.S. don‚Äôt eat much before we had enough food here for a whole day üòÇ

title: Great Peruvian food and Pisco class
text: Rafael provided an outstanding ceviche, causa and Lomo saltado making and pisco making experience!  The class was very well organized and step by step instructions were clear and extremely fun!Would highly recommend this class for all!Great job, Rafael!!  it is obvious that you put your heart and soul into the food and this class!

title: Cooking in Peru!
text: What an amazing experience. My friends and I showed up hungry and left stuffed. I was thoroughly impressed with the class and the Pisco sour mixology lesson. A booking well worth it!
Even if other people didn‚Äôt book that day, they taught the class only to me. Excellent explanations. You also have the option for vegans or celiacs üòå

title: very cool experience
text: It was a very cool experience! We learned how to make delicious traditional peruvian food with a very passionate chef, would highly recommend!

title: Fun and Filling
text: From start to finish- well organized fun experience that taught us the history of Peruvian cuisine. Delicious and fun! The best lomo saltado you‚Äôll find in Lima. Great location- after your VERY filling meal, you can take a walk along the malecon.

title: Great experience!
text: Rafael was an excellent chef and guide. He was very knowledgeable about each dish. He clearly loves his job. This was a delicious introductory course to get one acquainted with some Peruvian classics!

title: Beautiful tour of Lima
text: Excellent walk through the city and downtown Lima.Although it was just Fiestas Patrias and it was a sea of people we could enjoy a beautiful walk and just hooked a dance show in the celebrations in the Plaza de Armas Thanks to the directions of our guide everything was perfect.

title: Tour regular
text: We took a panoramic bus tour to see Lima. The bus met the basics, and the guide did his best to make sure this huge group of tourists could hear his story (without a megaphone). The departure time is inappropriate because you can't avoid the heat, you'll be sunbathed the entire walk, and you'll miss your lunch break.

title: Very varied city tour
text: You get a good overview of Lima, see Huaca Pucllana, a pre-Inca pyramid, the financial district of the city and the old town of Lima, which you can explore on foot. Finally, there was a pisco tasting.

title: Short tour but very nice if you are passing nomas!
text: Short walk, but very good for those who are passing and want to know a little bit of Lima. This excursion takes you through emblematic places of Lima, such as the much mentioned catacombs and Huaca Pucllana, which was like a ceremonial center of the ancient inhabitants. I recommend wearing glasses and cream to take care of the sun's skin, as it is intense these days. Thanks for the welcome!

title: Good experience
text: Great tour around the city alot interesting facts one learn would recommend to anyone visiting the city of lima me and the family enjoyed it a lot

title: Great tour
text: Great tour of Lima. Bring snacks as the tour was quite long. Included a stop at the cathedral and a stop at a souvenir shop where we tasted various pisco sours.

data.title: Lima Taxi
data.text: We booked an airport shuttle by using what's app and it was super easy! We were staying in Barranco in a very busy area. Jorge called us and let us know how close he was and was exactly on time!

title: An excellent experience!!
text: We used this company on our recent trip to Per√∫. Communication was done thru the WhatsApp and was very easy and prompt. We ended up using them multiple times - the cars that they operate are newer, clean and the drivers are very professional. I can highly recommend this company!!

title: Best private TRANSPORT service in Lima
text: It was easy to book, got a quick response and estimate. It helped to be precise with the number in your party, luggage type and number, and airline flight info to make booking much easier. All drivers were friendly, helpful, professional.

title: The best airport transfer in Lima!
text: I‚Äô had searched a few companies and this one was the best to communicate very well and promptly. The minute I booked my transfer with him, he sent all the information regarding my transfer details about the driver and the car. They even sent me the pic of it who would show up in the morning.The driver was even early at the hotel and it was a hassle free ! I will definitely use again and recommend to anyone. We felt safe as 2 girls traveling in Lima.

title: Convenient and professional
text: Making a reservation was very convenient and professional. The drivers were polite. On time and professional. We communicated every step of the way to ensure smooth transition. 10/10 recommendation!

title: Excellent service!
text: Super punctual and very well cared for and maintained cars..good driversExcellent service...it is the only transportation I use when I arrive in Lima...I totally recommend it..

title: excellent transfer option to and from Jorge Ch√°vez airport in Lima
text: The transfer service to and from the Jorge Ch√°vez airport in Lima was excellent. Well coordinated from the moment our plane landed in Lima. For the service to the airport, there was also fluid communication and we coordinated the pick-up location and time without problems.

title: Lima pickup
text: Driver contacted me as my flight arrived in Lima, letting me know he was ready to take me to my hotel. Oscar was professional, friendly and courteous. I will use this service again.

title: Great value for money
text: Easy, fast, reliable, good car and driver. On time and great value for Money. Was a pleasure. We used them in Lima, both to and from the airport.

title: Excellent and very professional service
text: Excellent from the first moment. Excellent communication and I loved that. Continuous contact via WhatsApp even with family members abroad. The car is in excellent condition and the driver is impeccable and very polite. They waited for my parents and let me know when they were with them. They are very happy with the service. We are going to hire them for the return. I was scared because it's not the Green Taxi inside the airport but the one at the airport didn't have such good reviews. This one has few but very good ones and their service has truly been first class. Thank you!

title: Huaca Pucllana and Museo Larco
text: Amazing visit to Huaca Pucllana an amazing place where you learn a lot about the pre-Inca cultures and a tour of the Larco Museum with a lot of information starts from our guide Rudy

title: Wonderful experience
text: The tour was great the tour guides were on time and very knowledgeable. I loved learning about my Peruvian culture. I would definitely do another tour again

title: Great Tour!
text: My small group booking ended up being a solo tour. My guide Jonathon was very knowledgeable about Peruvian history and culture and I thoroughly enjoyed this half day tour. I took the morning tour and it was nice to beat the crowds in Huaca Pucllana. Yes you could do it on your own but having a guide brings your experience to another level. The included transportation between the two sites was nice and efficient.Tip: After the tour of the Larco Museum have lunch at the Cafe Museo Larco. The food is delicious and service impeccable. I had reservations but was able to get in early.

title: Great experience!
text: I had a wonderful half day on this trip exploring Huaca Pucllana and the Larco Museum. The guide, Miguel, was very friendly and knowledgeable about the sites and both him and the driver (I didn‚Äôt catch his name) went out of their way to make me feel welcome and to recommend places to visit in Lima. I would highly recommend this tour. Both the pyramid and the museum are fascinating. Thank you!

title: Open museum Huaca Pucllana Lima Peru.
text: Place that evidences the pre-Columbian culture of Peru, excellently well preserved, cared for and managed. Ideal for a walk on a cloudy day, to take advantage and enjoy the walk or tour.

title: All very well.
text: All very well, the Guide, Miguel and the driver very correct. Good experience. Schedule very well fulfilled. Very well explained the visits.

title: You cannot visit Lima without doing this tour!
text: This was one of the best experiences we have had so far in Lima! We were greeted in the hotel by the most friendly person we have met so far on our trip. We got into the car and got a personalized driving tour and saw incredible sights. We then were taken for an amazing wine tasting with a lovely Peruvian wine connoisseur who told us all about the wines and the country which these were paired great with some tapas. All in all it was an amazing experience and we would recommend it to anyone as Adrian, Diego and Felipe were the best part of our entire experience! 100/10!

title: Great Wine tasting
text: Great wines and great company, Alfredo is such a good sommelier. We had many great peruvian wines. It‚Äôs a must go in Lima.

title: Dan has some very good skills
text: Dan is an excellent guide of high-quality foods. He really knows his foods and is very pleasant person. Very trustworthy.

title: Experience A1
text: Great concept with specific explanations for each moment. Excellent selected wines and correctly chosen bites that made a perfect pairing.

title: Quality service
text: Amazing service and first class care! Loved everything! The tasting was spectacular, inputs and very good products. It was run by a very top chef and everyone involved in the service super attentive and friendly. Anyway a good plan among friends or a gift for your boyfriend. And for anyone who loves wine.

title: Recommendation
text: Loved the experience, a spectacular ocean view and excellent wine selection! The cheeses that accompanied the tasting were delicious and the attention of somelier and chef Sebastian was very good.In my case I went alone and loved it as I could meet other people.
Wines and delicious cheeses! Excellent explanation of the sommelier and nice company. Very good plan to go with friends or couple.

title: A Delightful Exploration of Peruvian Wines and Cheeses
text: The Private Peruvian Wine and Cheese Tasting Experience was an exceptional opportunity to delve into the rich flavors of Latin America's wines and cheeses. Set in a charming wine store in Lima, the atmosphere was perfect for a relaxed yet sophisticated tasting experience.This tasting showcased a selection of five excellent wines. Each wine was thoughtfully paired with a variety of cheeses that perfectly complemented the flavors, making each sip and bite a delightful discovery. The host was knowledgeable and approachable, providing interesting facts about the wine-making process and the specific regions each wine came from, which added depth to our tasting.It was a fantastic way to spend an afternoon, and I highly recommend it to anyone interested in learning more about wine and cheese from this fascinating region. It's a delightful and engaging experience that promises both fun and education in a single evening.

title: lovely Tour
text: Had a wonderful tour with Diego. He asked me which was my preferred food and it was hard to decide as it was all delicious. Varied foods, delicious drinks and some lovely settings. A good way to try a few restaurants and foods if you are a solo traveler, thanks Foodies Peru.

title: Fantastic.
text: I want to thank the guide Suzanne who accompanied us on the City Tour by Lima, very nice, friendly Cover, familiar with historical facts and curiosities.....was Top!!!

title: Amazing places!!!!!
text: Wonderful excursion. I want to especially thank Suzane on the City Tour in Lima, amazing Cover.In Machu Picchu was not very good, a lot of confusion, but our guide Habraan was very good and led us to the important points.

title: Exceptional
text: Wonderful trip and very well planned. Guides prepared, formidable assistance, assistance up at the airport, always confirming the day before on the itinerary. Excellent accommodations. Transfers and tours are always punctual.

title: Maravilhoso
text: Very well prepared team. Especially in Cusco. Careful and charismatic guides. Always willing to help . We love it.

title: I liked the explanations of the tour guides and accompaniment, the punctual transfers and communication
text: Continue to offer the same level of Service. Excellent communication with agents and tourists. Very good offer of tourist services

title: Incredible journey
text: Great guides, super attentive, friendly and patient. They passed a lot of knowledge about the Inca culture. The journey provided by them was incredible. I highly recommend it :)

title: The balance between health, family and prosperity were the choices left to me by the guides of their culture
text: Definitely one of the best options to meet, Peru, drivers and guides, very prepared, attentive, polite and friendly

title: Very competent receptive. Note 10.
text: Very good receptive! Outstanding for the guides Mario, Miguel and Ronaldo for their competence, patience and identity with the Inca culture.

title: Knowing the history of a people explains the present we live
text: Very interesting days, rich in local history; appreciation of the Sacred and tasting of good gastronomy.Very attentive and kind guides

title: Good service for first timer in Lima
text: The driver Cristian is very patient and have waited for close to an hour because of long queue at immigration and delays in dispatching luggage‚Äôs. He has very good manners and a very safe driver.Highly recommended this service.

title: Recommended! :)
text: Very efficient pickup at the airport - messaging via WhatsApp - and the driver was helpful and cheerful! - recommended :)

title: Christian was a good driver for us.
text: Our driver was Christian and he did a great job getting us from the airport to our hotel in Miraflores with no issues. We didn‚Äôt see Christian right away when we arrived, so we used the WhatsApp app to communicate with him so we could find each other in the airport. The communication was really helpful and we were able to find each other within minutes of our arrival. For a first time visit in an unfamiliar place, we will always get a driver when possible to take the stress off of getting around.

title: Will use them again and again and again
text: Excellent experience. Set this up for a family member traveling solo. Communication was on point with excellent details. Price does not include tolls which is on noted on the profile (im a fan of clarity like this)Will use them again!! Thank you for the great experience!

title: Rude driver, nothing to say to us, left us sitting in the car without explanation...
text: At first, we couldn't find our driver; he wasn't holding the sign up... He took the bags when we found him. He wasn't welcoming, had no conversation. He walked us to the parking pay station where we stood with him in the line. Then he took us to the car, closed the doors and shut us inside and left for more than 10 minutes. No idea where he went. He got back in the car, started driving, and NEVER SAID A WORD. After almost 2 hours passed, I asked him if we were close and if he could turn on some air, and then I learned OUR DRIVER WAS WATCHING TV ON HIS PHONE WITH HIS EARBUDS IN AND COULDN'T HEAR ANYTHING!! A soccer match nonetheless. I ended up shouting to get his attention to ask him to turn on some air; it was soooo hot!The only thing he said to us was after he dropped us at the hotel was propina? propina? propina? Want a tip? Pay attention to the people in the car.

title: Excellent service! Would definitely recommend over any other options.
text: The customer support works 24/7 and isn't a bot. Extremely helpful with answering any questions and then connects you with your driver before your booked times. First driver spoke enough English to have a conversation with me which was very welcoming. All in all excellent service and would recommend any travellers. Booked it twice because of how professional they were.

title: Great transfer service
text: Excellent transfer!We had a wonderful experience with the transfer service. The driver, Carlos Ospino, was extremely punctual and attentive ‚Äî he waited for us patiently as we landed and passed through the immigration. In addition, helped to load the bags with a lot of kindness and education.The car was spacious, clean and very comfortable, which made the trip from the airport to the hotel even more pleasant. We definitely recommend this service and especially the driver Carlos. Professionalism and cordiality from beginning to end!

title: Smooth experience despite delays ‚Äî great coordination and service
text: We had just landed in Lima after a long international flight and had no cell reception at first, so we were a little anxious about meeting our airport pickup. Despite this, everything went surprisingly smoothly. Our original driver (who messaged us clearly on WhatsApp and waited patiently at Door 3) wasn‚Äôt able to make it in the end, but he coordinated with another driver who arrived on time and picked us up with no issues. Communication was clear, and even though we were stuck in customs for nearly an hour, the driver kept reassuring us that he would wait ‚Äî which he did, without complaint. The backup driver was professional and got us to our hotel safely and comfortably in an air-conditioned SUV. All in all, the service was reliable, flexible, and well-organized ‚Äî exactly what you want after a long travel day. Highly recommended.

title: Willie from California
text: The driver contact us before arrival, send me the location door picture, waiting outside the exit door with the sign my name and take us to the hotel.

title: Great experience
text: Great driver. Navigating the roads in Lima is not easy but my driver did a great job. She kept in touch w me in regards to where to meet. All in all highly recommend.

title: Fun experience!!
text: Really enjoyed the experience.  Leo was a great instructor and very patient and helpful. Reasonable price and lots of time in the water

title: Caught 3 waves...first time!
text: I had a 1.5 hour lesson with Leo as instructor. We practiced the 1, 2, 3 method for catching a wave and standing up...multiple times on the beach until he was confident I would remember it. Then, into the surf on a BIG wide board. The lesson took place in a good shallow area just below the nearby pier/restaurant. I caught three small waves with him giving a small push and shouting instructions about timing. He was very patient while working with a 50 year old mama like me. Will go again!

title: Most exciting thing I've ever experienced!
text: If you catch a wave, you'll never want to get off!I came in afraid because I have trauma, but what you do at the beginning is therapy to see how you feel, the first few minutes a warm up outside and details and techniques of how to pass a wave and how to sit and stand. Let‚Äôs go inside and the guide always talks to you to generate more confidence (video recording) once you are calmer start the stop, when you stop for the rest of the fun. I have taken it several times because I have a long stay and every day you do not get satisfied, in my case it is. I must emphasize that the guides are always friendly and with good vibes. Thank you Milton, who was my guide.

title: Tour with Lima America Tours
text: What a nice experience, we loved the treatment of the guides, the places we met and what we tasted, 100% recommended!!!
Excellent guide very good tour, with lots of information about the city and culture, in good weather!!!!!!!!

title: Excellent Tour
text: Excellent explanation. Entertaining and on schedule. The pisco tasting was good and it went around the center with lots of curious data

title: Interesting tour of the center with delicious pisco
text: Very nice tour of the center and a lot of information about the daily life in Peru. The chocolate museum and the pisco tasting are great. Augusto is a very nice and knowledgeable guide!

title: Excellent
text: Excellent tour, very personalized since there were only 3 of us tourists. The guide accompanied us at all times without rushing us, allowing us to explore the places of interest, providing valuable information and data.

title: History with a splash of Pisco and a sprinkle of chocolate
text: August was very friendly and knowledgeable about the historic significance of several buildings, architecture, and art. He even recommended an excellent place to have lunch after the tour!

title: Extremely funny
text: Arturo and his brother are excellent guides, I really loved the way they told me interesting facts about Lima.

title: Great experience

title: Great Tour....however, free on a different website...
text: This is a great walking tour, however, I found out at the end of the tour that the other folks found this tour on a free website and did not pay $30 and ended up tipping a small amount at the end. So, do your research...

title: Excellent activity
text: Excellent experience in Lima, learn to cook, causes lime, as does ceviche, and also the famous pisco Sour

title: 5 stars
text: I loved the experience. The chef Camila was very nice and clear to explain the recipes. The food that was prepared was asesores, all the ingredients were fresh and high quality. All the People were really happy learning and tasting their creations.

title: Fun, informative and delicious!
text: So fun and personal - market tour with our guide and cooking instructor, Camila!We were just 2 of us for the market tour before class and Camilla was genuine and personable and informative!!

title: Excellent
text: Amazing experience!! I had the marked tour with Dasha - I learned so much and got to try new fruits and cheese! And the cooking class was with Camilla - I very much enjoyed it - excellent class!

title: Amazing all around!
text: Amazing all around. Lucho was amazing!!! The food was so good, very fun company and you learned a lot about the culture and dishes that you made!

title: Excellent place
text: Excellent experience by hand of Chef Dasha, very didactic and fun, I loved it as she explained everything step by step, and if we did not understand some name she told us by what other names are known

title: Cooking Class with Lucho
text: Lucho was great has great knowledge of the cuisine and the history of Peru. Would come back fs! The ceviche was delicious and a lot of fun to make

title: Exquisite cooking class
text: Excellent experience! Camilla taught us to cook an exquisite cause, pisco sour and ceviche without a doubt we loved the class, we absolutely recommend it.Thank you Camila for making our experience unforgettable

title: Wonderful ! 100% recommend
text: 100% recommend : it was amazing ! Camila was so nice and insightful during the market visit : great tastingLudo was also a great teacher for the cooking class : we had lots of fun cooking 2 beautiful dishes and the cocktail ! Thank you !

title: Cool tour, but room for improvement
text: The trip itself had some cool visit points and some good spots. With that being said we had some things in the tour we find a bit Strange.We were asked extra soles for tickets and entrances without clarification of what we actually got a ticket for, and would have loved for it to just be included in the price so there was more transparency about what we were paying for.Also the planning for a two day trip was a bit Strange. For example there was a tasting in the program for both days which turned out to be a tasting of exactly the 3 same sweets. The tour ended in huacachina and we would have had to find back to our own hotel in ica, even though the tour states we could stay both places. However the busdriver drove us some of the way so we had to walk less. But had he not had the hotel very close to where the bus was going anyway we would have to navigate quite far without internet connection which didnt feel optimal.Again there are some good spots and places worth visiting, and the guide we had on day 2 did a stellar job, but in general the tour could have felt more professional.

title: Great tour!
text: Our brief time in Lima was made so much more special with Jennifer as our guide. Her knowledge of the city, history, and influences on the food culture is boundless. She loves her work and really made the experience special!

title: Touring Lima and testing its gastronomy
text: It was all very good and delicious, the explanation of the Jenifer guide was the best of every dish we tried!! Thank you very much for everything and the good service!

title: Very good
text: The tour was very good. Great views and great sand board. Sometimes you just have to watch for the people who delay the whole group.

text: Very good service, always watchful of all tourists, beautiful places where they took us, punctual and fulfill what promised, I recommend them!!!

title: Good service

text: Our guide, Susana, was knowledgeable with respect to Lima‚Äôs history and culture (of course) but also very personable‚Ä¶ weaving her family history and personal experiences into the tour. She welcomed our questions and answered them with respect and cheerfulness. This was a wonderful introduction to Lima and all of Peru for us.

title: Fantastic tour
text: It was a fantastic introduction to Lima on my first day solo travelling. Despite the clouds, the tour guide made it a memorable experience

title: Samira's walking tour
text: Had a great walking tour,Samira was a very informative ,fun and great tour guide who spoke good English  üëç üëè üòÄ we really enjoyed the tour

title: You should do this tour!
text: This was a very, fun tour that‚Äôs worth the money. The tour literally lasts the entire day, so plan accordingly. Rose was a great tour guide with a lot of energy and passion. I highly recommend this tour!

title: Highly recommend - great day ü§ó
text: We had a great day with Rose. Precise information ahead of time per WhatsApp, pickup on time, good driver (Willy), lovely boat tour with penguins & sealions, and spectacular sand dune driving with sand boarding. Efficiently organised food made it possible to do all this in one day.

title: Good day trip but it's a long day
text: We enjoyed this excursion. Our tour guide Maurice was all business and got us from a to c safely. The boat trip to Isla Balletes was interesting. It was 2 hours long, the guide on the boat tour was very informative about the wild life seen on the island. I would recommend bringing warm layers as it gets very cold during the boat trip. We enjoyed the Pisco vineyards. The lunch menu here is very reasonable. The tasting was interesting and informative. The part of the tour we loved the most was Huacachina. It is worth the visit. The dune buggy ride was insane. So fast, it was like a rollercoaster ride in ways. The sand boarding was good fun. A good adrenaline rush. To be honest, we would have preferred to have more time here and could have skipped the boat tour part. We wished we had more time and would have arranged to stay here on our trip. Breakfast, lunch and dinner wasn't included but our guide made it easy for us to find affordable options on the tour. I will warn, it is a very long day, starting at 5 am and due to traffic we did not get back to our hostel in Lima till 23:45. So we were exhausted. Also, the bus was not what was described in the details. (We confirmed this with another couple on the tour who also thought the same). We were on a small mini bus which sat 13 people. The seats were narrow and it was difficult to get comfortable, especially on the 5 hour drive back from Huacachina to Lima.

title: Thanks, we enjoyed ourselves
text: Diego is a good guide Good information very helpful The programs were nice We enjoy ourselves We recommend these tour We wish we had more time after that boat ride

title: Unexplainable experience. Everything was perfect, at least three days within one
text: Rose is the best guide in the world!!! Went on 29/09/2025 and I‚Äôm flabbergasted with the experience! Everything was perfect, from the logistics, to the places we‚Äôve seen. Las Islas, lo Pisco, the recomended lunch at Ica, the crazy buggy rides, sandboarding, etc - the experience and the places you are able to see are completely worth the price. Definely a must on everyones bucket list. Hope you have the luck to be booked with Rose too, she is magnificent!!! Notes: - Lunch at Ica not included, but worth it! - Need some soles to use bathrooms during the activities: - You can sandboard with a stand-up board as well, which is not included. Might be only worth it if you already know how to snow/sandboard. (Laying sandboard is already included, might alteady fill your adrenaline need).

title: A great time with amazing photo opportunities!
text: It was an amazing experience!Our tour guide was Rose and she did an excellent job, making sure we got to each activity well in time. We were contacted about the pickup well ahead of time, and also got help to arrange transport to the meeting spot making it much easier for us. From there it was a comfortable coach journey between the destinations, with well timed food and bathroom breaks.The experiences along the way were really good. My personal favourite was seeing the desert, and the sunset over the dunes. But also seeing the wildlife by boat was awesome, they boat got us really close and we got to see all the animals highlighted in the tour description.Would absolutely recommend!

title: ROSE IS THE BEST MOM GUIDE EVER
text: WE LOVE YOU ROSE! It was an amazing experience ‚ô•Ô∏è The recomended food was awesome, the pisco taste, marine life and the dunes I have no words to describe!

title: Lima.Tour Guide. Wine tasting. Sand Dunes üôå

title: Amazing Tour
text: The tour was absolutely amazing, but our tour guide Rose really made this so memorable. She made us laugh, took great care of us and had an amazing attitude from beginning to end.The boat was amazing and we got to see alot of animals.Lunch and pisco tasting was amazing.The sand buggies and sand board was 10/10 and I can‚Äôt wait to do this again in the near future.

title: Incredible Tour

title: Overall well

title: Trip to the Oasis

title: For nature and adventure lovers, Fully recommendedo
text: Excellent tour, the tour of the Ballestas Islands very beautiful and the adventure in the Huacahina of death!!!! Highly recommended, very punctual, friendly and fun.

title: Sand dunes!
text: Milagros a tour guide at the catacombs hooked me up with Vivencial Trips. She asked me if I had any booked activities and I said no. Because I was staying really close to the airport so no tour agency was willing to pick me up at the airport area. Milagros made a call and I only paid $5 usd extra!!! I was picked up and dropped off by the airport area. Most tourist stay in Miraflores and that‚Äôs where all the pick up/drop off points are. Thank you Milagros. Martin the driver and Valeria were amazing. We were safe the whole time and made it back in time. Valeria is very kind, I enjoyed her as our tour guide. This was a long activity. Approximately 14+ hours.

title: One of the wonders of the world on my visit to Peru
text: A great experience, it seemed fantastic, I didn't imagine it, and I didn't believe I would be sliding on the sand. They took us in the Buggi cart, it was a roller coaster ride.

title: Everything perfect
text: Everything perfect! We were picked up early from the hotel and taken to all the places they promise, all the guides and very professional and friendly drivers nothing was overpriced and the schedules and activities were fulfilled

title: The Best of the Best üåπ
text: One of the best activities you can enjoy, whether with family, as a couple, or alone... the important thing is to enjoy it and want to have a great time! Enjoy the pleasant company! Thanks to Maximos and Arnold!!!una de las mejores actividad que puedas disfrutar , tanto en familia, pareja o solo‚Ä¶ lo importante esta en disfrutar y que desees pasarla Super Bien! disfruta de compa√±ia amena! Gracias a Maximos y a Arnold!!!üåπü•∞üôå

title: Traveling with friends enjoys the trip
text: We had an amazing time, the trip exceeded our expectations, with spectacular places and food, super professional and friendly Carito, recommended everything

title: Wonderful experience, a must do!
text: Such an incredible experience, day before the tour everything was coordinated with pickup times. Once on board bus, we were always informed on next stops and what was to come. Great communication throughout. Each activity was a blast. Bus was very comfortable with a/c, recliner seats and window shades. It will be a long day full of travel but well worth it. Bring toilet paper not all stops will have it. The buggy ride was a lot of fun, but if you have any sort of injuries or pregnant would not recommend, you will get tossed around. Lunch at the winery was amazing and the Pisco tasting was a ton of fun!

title: Despite the bad weather, wonderful experience
text: Pontuais, it went well with the rides. But the coffee is not included as it appears in the advertisement. I became insecure buying through the site, but it went all right.

title: A memorable experience!
text: Overall, the trip was good. Everything offered as part of the trip was received. The locations were fun and beautiful (though the water at the first stop smelled awful). My only complaint was that the bus was on the smaller side and a bit tight for anyone over 5‚Äô4. Also, if I could suggest anything I would suggest that the guide be more mindful of where the group is during stops.

title: Not worth the money or time if you are limited and not Spanish speaking.
text: Good places to visit, but overall 18 hours day is not worth the money or time. Our group was whole Spanish speaking apart from 2 of us and we really felt like rejects and that our continuous requests to explain information in English were getting in the way ‚òπÔ∏è after just 1 hour drive we've stopped "for breakfast and toilet" which was wasted time. Another 2 hours drive and we got to Paracas. Looked beautiful but there was no free time to explore area. After long and chaotic wait we got on the boats to go to the Isla Ballestas - stunning views and very informative guide on the boat made everyone happy ‚ò∫Ô∏è another hour drive and we came to Ica - for lunch and traditional drinks tasting. Not much to choose from the options but food was actually delicious. Vine and Pisco tasting/presentation was amazing with great guide that once again helped to lift the mood and made us feel welcomed - not just the Spanish speaking people. Waiting time there was very long, people in no hurry ect. 25 min drive and we got to Huacachina - natural Oasis and dunes. It was highlight of the trip ÔºÉÔ∏è but again there was no free time as it was actually getting dark by the time everyone came down to the meeting point. Lots of it was down to other people in the group but could have been better organised overall. Also, we were supposed to get free bottled water and snacks in the morning but that didn't happen. Overall would be good trip if guide was speaking to both Spanish and English (very poor knowledge of English language) and if it wasn't such long day (18 hours from pick up to drop off). Also, considering the price we've paid we wouldn't give more than 3 stars.

title: Long trip but worthy.
text: 18 hours for the whole trip is too long for everyone, tourists, guide, driver. We were all tired but it was exciting and worth every dollar.

title: What an experience
text: Interesting tour in a small group, happy we didn't have to drive on our own as traffic is heavy from Lima and roads are bumpy, plus the heat exhaustion. It is good to ask a driver for turning on AC. We sont speak Spanish so it wasn't easy to understand our guide even she tried to speak english, but found another bilingual couple who could translate for us. It was worthy of money as all the fees are included except the food, snacks or water you have to buy on your own and are not provided. We didn't have any soles but we were able to pay in $ or with credit card otherwise it would be impossible to survive without water, that's why only 4*.

title: Very good tour!
text: This is an amazing experience that surpassed my high expectations. The views are unbeatable, the adventure ride and sand surfing in the desert were fun and exciting, the food/wine/pisco were great, and the hosts and other guests were nice and friendly. I highly recommend booking your trip now!

title: Wonderful!
text: The tour was wonderful; the landscapes beautiful. Seeing the penguins and seals in the Ballestas Islands and the Oasis in Huacachina Lagoon was very beautiful, a lot of adrenaline. Javier was an excellent guide.

title: Huacachina was the ultimate!!
text: The tour was excellent and exceeded all my expectations, absolutely everything was planned and we were able to do quite a few things, in a single wonderful word, I will be back soon, thank you for the experience.

title: Magical Peru
text: Amazing day. Everything was perfectly coordinated. Everyone was expecting us as we arrived with our tickets for different activities already taken care of. Our driver and our guide were both great. We booked another tour through Lucia two days after this one based on how good this experience was. Highly recommend.

title: I loved Ica.
text: It was an excellent experience to carry out this tour with my wife, her punctual services, friendly, all of quality, the guidance of Miss Roxana very pleasant , if I recommend this tour with Inca Trilogy, next summer I will do it with my family.

title: Travel through the oasis
text: The service was good and the driver as the assigned Guide Roxana were very friendly and patient at all times, tried always to have us comfortable ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Recommended agency

title: Unforgettable experience in Lima!

Super recommended if you can do not miss the opportunity to tour from the airport to the emblematic sites of Lima and back to the airport to follow the journey!

title: Very nice tour

title: No objection, everything perfect
text: Very interesting tour, Ricardo a very good Pro: didactic, friendly, always willing to answer all our questions. Diego, unblemished driver. Thank you both very much.

title: Edwin and Steve love you üíï
text: The experience was amazing. Edwin our guide was amazing, attentive, friendly, very knowledgeable and patient. Steve very good driver, quiet driving and yet we reach all our destinations with time to enjoy. Super honest and good edwin recommendations. Thank you very much.

Claudia, our guide, a genius and the group that put together was very funny. We had a great time, nice places. Sleep well the night before. The tour is quite long but it gets along well if you have a good group like ours. Thanks for everything.

title: Highly recommended
text: Highly recommended tour, the agency was very diligent, organized and very punctual. I want to highlight to the guide Edwin for his willingness and good communication, an excellent person

title: Daytrip from Lima
text: I recently had the pleasure of joining Edwin for a day trip, and I can confidently say it was an unforgettable experience. From start to finish, the entire adventure was filled with excitement, laughter, and great energy.

title: Excellent, everything was, well planned, well guided and the driver of the Buggi, an excellent driver to raise the a
text: Excellent, everything was, well planned, well guided and the driver of the Buggi, an excellent driver to lift the adrenaline

title: The Sand in Peru
text: Thank you to Rose for guiding me on the right tour and probably the best in Peru. Diego was the coolest tour guide. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to go to the moon.üî•üî•

title: Great times on Bucket List Tours with Rose
text: Rose was great. Her English was perfect and her customer service was amazing. I would recommend her to all my friends to visit this perfect paradise. Great job Roses. Thank you.

title: Huacachina snowboarding
text: Great day out in Huacachina with Rose! Managed to fit in a lot of activities within the day and didn‚Äôt feel rushed at all!!

title: Excellent experience surfing the dunes!
text: Was not expecting this! Such a memorable day in Huacachina in a desert oasis, surfing sand dunes and visiting a vineyard where they make Pisco.I was staying at Waikiki hostel in Lima where I met Rose. She literally bounced into my life!! Rose is the travel agent at our hostel and I enquired about a walking tour to Barranco. We got chatting and she recommended this trip. I‚Äôd seen it online but it was a little out of my price range. She hooked me right up!! Rose gave me the best price for an amazing day out.I was out for 15 hours in total and about 8 of this was driving (to Huacachina and back) but the bus was large, comfortable and air conditioned with stops for toilet breaks and snacks on route.The pisco tasting was great, very informative and so much fun. I learned many fun Spanish phrases when toasting.Then it was into some dune buggies to surf the sand dunes. The ride was thrilling but bumpy (caution to those with a bad back). The sand dune surfing was brilliant. It was surprisingly easy but super fast.All in all, fab day out!
It was exciting and full of information about the Peruvian history. Great entertainment and fun activities. Thank you for the friendly helpful hosts.

title: Realization of a dream
text: Fantastic... wonderful place, sea lions, penguins, lots of birds, all very beautiful. Boat trip with exceptional guide. Then we went to the two with bugs, good muuuuito. Beautiful place. Excellent guides. Super recommend.

title: Ica-Paracas tour experience
text: I was in agreement with what they offer, compliance, Ballestas Island is the best, the hotel restaurant is very good, the guide was very kind and helpful, to improve I had more expectations in the pisco tour, since I needed to know the manufacturing process

title: Maravillas
text: It was a beautiful and safe experience. My tour guide, Valeria, was very attentive. They were very punctual at pickup time, I really liked that

title: Poor experience
text: If you have a chance to take a tour with another operator do it. The guide did not show mastery of the itinerary, omitting information about the stops and their times, nor did it maintain a line in the story he made during the tour. Personally I selected this experience to meet Pisco Nietto and the tasting ended up being somewhere else, where there was disorder at the time of charging for lunches.The weather in Huacachina is very short and disorganized, the activities are after lunch and are a bit heavy.The best was the tour to the Islands, where the guide of the place (Rocio), provided a great experience telling the peculiarities of the Islands and their fauna.The bus was very small, next to me was a large person and we were both very uncomfortable.

title: Excellent
text: Excellent tour times, all very organized and fulfilled the itineraryJaviar the guide very attentive and always kept the group informed and organized

title: Continuation
text: Just complement my previous comment. The route described was not the one followed in the day. In the description says "stop in Huacachina...internal part...Hotel Desert. Then outside with bugs lasting 1 hour." If the driver of the Bugue gave us 5 minutes (cried with passenger that should slow down the dune "and that I don't have the whole day and buzinava impacient+ 5 minutes of sandboard... was not 1 hour in Huacachina.

title: Beautiful hikes but completely inadequate van
text: Beautiful excursions. Terrible transport van given the amount of hours: you can not make 10 hours of travel in a day van, in 25 people, all cramped. As other fellow travellers put it "never again"! So the 3 stars are for really beautiful excursions (which deserve 5 stars!), but in reality the organization deserves 1 star: van completely inadequate, always present disturbing music, not particularly nice guide.

title: Huacachina
text: Guides Joel and Cristian are attentive, experienced, fun and make the trip always unforgettable! Very fun!

title: Good Boat Ride & Fun Sand Dunes
text: Gabby, our guide, was excellent. She took very good care of us. I especially enjoyed the boat trip to the island to see the sea lions and various sea birds. And the trip to the sand dunes was fun ‚Äì I wish we could‚Äôve spent more time there. It was, however, a very long day.

title: Bus around Lima with my pet
text: Good experience. Bus looks clean and save. Tour guide was professional and provided accurate information around city. Price was around local market. I could take the bus with my pet. Also, company is committed with social causes in benefit of animals, in this case, with Esperanza callejera asociation.

title: Petfriendly

text: If you only have one day in Lima, do this tour! It‚Äôs a perfect sampler of the city‚Äôs best spots, from plazas and cathedrals to coastal views. The panoramic windows on the bus gave us great views the entire time.

text: It was relaxed but full of great sights. The panoramic views from the bus were amazing, especially along the Costa Verde. We got off at a few key spots for photos and history. Our guide was super friendly and knowledgeable.

text: We saw the Cathedral, San Francisco church, and the main square, plus some hidden gems. The guide explained everything in a simple and fun way. I left feeling I know much more about the city now! üëè

text: We laughed, learned, and saw so many places in just one ride! üòÑ The guide was super friendly and made the history of Lima come alive. The bus was comfy and air-conditioned , great for a sunny day. A perfect balance between sightseeing and relaxation.

text: We sat back, relaxed, and let the guide show us all the cool spots. Great mix of culture, history, and scenery , plus some awesome photo ops. Loved cruising past the cliffs of Miraflores and colorful Barranco!

text: We joined this panoramic tour with our kids and had such a good time! The pace was relaxed, the bus was comfortable, and the guide kept things interesting for both adults and children. We loved the stop in the colonial district and the ocean views in Miraflores.

text: The tour showed us both the old and new Lima. I loved walking through the main square, seeing the government palace, and learning about the city‚Äôs past. The guide also gave tips for food and places to visit after the tour, which was really helpful.

text: We started in the modern area, then went to the historic center with its amazing cathedral and colorful balconies. The guide explained everything in a simple and fun way. Time went by so fast!

text: If you don‚Äôt have much time in Lima, this half-day tour is a great option. We saw churches, plazas, and even had a chance to enjoy some local atmosphere. Everything was well organized.

text: Efficient and well-organized! The pickup was on time, the van was comfortable, and the tour was packed with cool facts and pretty sights. I left the tour wanting to learn even more about Lima‚Äôs rich history.

title: A memorable trip
text: Our guide spoke excellent English and made every stop meaningful. From the Government Palace to the churches, every moment felt like stepping through time. Great way to start your day in the city!

title: A spectacular experience
text: Lima really impressed me, and this tour helped me appreciate its beauty and past. We walked through charming streets, learned about ancient civilizations, and even got some great restaurant recommendations from our guide.

title: Everything was well-organized
text: We got to see the historical center, including the Plaza Mayor and the Cathedral. The stories about colonial times and pre-Columbian history were fascinating. Everything was well organized.

title: Very well done
text: Very well done! We especially enjoyed the colonial architecture and learning about Lima‚Äôs role during the Spanish era. The bus was clean and air-conditioned, which made the experience even better.

title: An incredible experience
text: I went with my family, and we all loved it! The boat was clean, and the guides gave us snacks and water. My kids didn‚Äôt swim, but they enjoyed watching the sea lions jump and play in the water. The photos we took are incredible!

title: It was amazing
text: We booked this tour for something different, and it was amazing! The sea lions were not scared of us at all, they just swam and played. The water was a bit cold, but the wetsuit helped. Our guide explained everything before the swim and stayed with us in the water.

title: A great time
text: We had a great time on this tour. The boat was fast and comfortable, and the views of the islands were amazing. We saw birds, penguins, and hundreds of sea lions. Swimming near them was safe and well-organized. I was nervous at first, but the guide made me feel calm.

title: A nice tour
text: This was a nice break from city sightseeing. The Palomino tour was a perfect mix of adrenaline and relaxation. Swimming close to the sea lions was a once-in-a-lifetime experience üòç. Definitely worth it if you love nature!

title: Unique adventure
text: Such a unique experience just outside Lima! The Palomino tour lets you appreciate the rich marine life up close. Swimming with the sea lions made me appreciate nature even more.

title: A memorable experience
text: Palomino Islands were a hidden gem near Lima. The guides were helpful and made sure everyone was comfortable in the water. Swimming alongside sea lions in their natural habitat was something I‚Äôll always remember!

title: A wonderful day
text: Such a wonderful day on the water! We hopped on the speedboat and headed toward Palomino Islands. Swimming with the sea lions was honestly a highlight of our trip in Lima üòÅ. It felt wild and natural, not a tourist trap at all!

title: Everything was clear
text: The group was friendly, and the guide explained everything clearly. Swimming with sea lions was something I‚Äôd never imagined doing. I was a bit scared, but they were so gentle and curious. Don‚Äôt worry if you‚Äôre alone , you‚Äôll feel part of the adventure.

title: What a great experience

If you like something not boring, do this.

title: A fun day
text: We started from Callao port, and after a smooth ride, we reached the Palomino Islands. The sea lions were everywhere! You get a wetsuit and life jacket if you want to swim. The water was cold but manageable. It‚Äôs safe, fun, and very different from typical Lima activities.

title: A brilliant adventure
text: A great combination of culture, food, and entertainment. üéâ The Paso horses were the most elegant I‚Äôve ever seen, and the buffet lunch was full of authentic Peruvian flavors. A must-do if you're in Lima!

title: Loved this
text: The setting was beautiful, and the whole experience was filled with joy. I learned a lot about Peruvian traditions, and the dancers were so talented. The food was flavorful, especially the causa and the quinoa dishes!

title: A wonderful experience
text: Everything was so well done! From the warm welcome to the tasty buffet and the beautiful cultural show. The Paso horses were unlike anything I‚Äôve seen before ,strong but gentle, and the bond with their riders was touching. A wonderful experience!

title: A nice entertainment
text: From the moment we walked in, we were surrounded by delicious smells and colorful sights. The buffet was rich in flavor, the dancers performed with pure passion, and the horses were a perfect finale , gracefully moving to the rhythm of Peruvian culture.

title: An incredible experience
text: We tasted different dishes from all over Peru and then we were treated to a show filled with rich traditions. The Paso horses were so well trained and elegant, and the dancers‚Äô outfits were stunning. It felt like we were seeing a piece of Peruvian soul.

title: I hadn't expected it to be this much fun!
text: The food was great , a huge variety to try , and the show was a wonderful journey into Peruvian traditions. The dancers were passionate, the horses were majestic, and the whole afternoon felt festive and authentic.

title: A cool experience
text: We filled our plate at the buffet with all the classics, then sat back and enjoyed a charming show. The Paso horses were a wonderful surprise ,seeing them perform alongside traditional dancers made for a rich, colorful experience.

title: Such a rich, festive afternoon!
text: The food was delicious and abundant , we tasted a bit of everything. The highlight for me was the show afterward: a perfect blend of Peruvian traditions ‚Äî from Marinera dancers spinning gracefully to horses that seemed to move to the rhythm of the music

title: An incredible experience
text: The vibes were amazing! I came for the buffet and stayed for the dancing and horses üòÑ Everything was super entertaining, and the staff made it feel really special.

title: A memorable experience
text: The buffet lunch was outstanding, offering a wide selection of traditional Peruvian dishes. The dance show was vibrant and professionally performed, and the Peruvian Paso horses were a beautiful showcase of grace and tradition. A well-organized and memorable cultural experience.

title: What a special tour
text: I always thought of Lima as just modern and coastal, but Huaca Pucllana changed that. It was like stepping into another time. And Miraflores was super photogenic. A great way to learn and relax at the same time.

title: An eye-opening tour!
text: I loved how we went from the ocean breeze in Miraflores to the ancient adobe bricks of Huaca Pucllana. It really shows how Lima blends old and new. The guide was friendly and full of stories. Great half-day activity!

title: Super cool experience
text: This tour gave us the best of both worlds, modern Lima and ancient Peru! The contrast between Miraflores and Huaca Pucllana was amazing. I had no idea there was a pyramid hiding in the middle of Lima. Super cool experience.

text: We started in modern Miraflores with all its green spaces and coastal beauty, then stepped into the past at Huaca Pucllana. It was fascinating to see pre-Inca ruins surrounded by the city. Our guide was knowledgeable and fun too.
